programme.title: American Experience
programme.desc: Nixon. Part of the American Experience series on the presidents, this three-hour documentary examines the quest, triumph, fall, and legacy of one of America's most fascinating and controversial presidents. From his modest beginnings among the lemon groves in Yorba Linda, CA, to his taking on the highest position in the nation, the story of Richard Milhous Nixon is characterized by contradiction. A staunch anti-communist, Nixon opened up relations with China and the Soviet Union and took steps to end the conflict in Vietnam. American Experience describes how Nixon promoted family values and how he used his poker earnings to finance his first political campaign. From congressman to senator to vice president under Eisenhower, a man uncomfortable in his own skin, Nixon was nonetheless a tireless campaigner. The program details the "Pink Lady" campaign, the "Checkers" speech, and the humiliation of Watergate

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Adam Sandler's second popular starring vehicle after Billy Madison is a goofy lowbrow paean to golf, hockey, and the comic hysterics of its childlike star. In Happy Gilmore, Sandler plays the title character, a raw, determined, but ultimately untalented hockey player who keeps trying out for the pros. When Happy discovers his grandmother (Frances Bay) will lose her home if she doesn't fork over 270,000 dollars to the IRS, he tries to figure out how he can possibly scrounge up the cash. An idea strikes during a game of one-upmanship with a couple furniture movers stripping his grandmother's home: On his first-ever swing, he drives a golf ball farther than the movers have ever seen. Before long, he has transplanted the foul-mouthed, aggressive persona of the hockey rink to the links, winning an amateur tourney that earns him a spot on the pro tour. Throttling everyone from a helpless caddy to game show host Bob Barker during the course of his 90-day quest to amass prize money, Happy also wins the sport a legion of new fans with his in-your-face style. Guiding him on his quest is a whimsical retired pro who lost his hand to an alligator (Carl Weathers) and an attractive public relations woman charmed by Happy's antics (Julie Bowen). Opposing him, however, is sneering hotshot Shooter McGavin (Christopher McDonald), who will do anything to win his championship jacket and see Happy fail

programme.desc: The FBI can't get close to hacker Tom, but agent Malcolm knows a way. He gets back into his fatsuit again to get a job as nanny to Tom's children. But can he crack the case at the same time as helping the hacker's unhappy kids?

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: Martin Lawrence plays Malcolm Turner, an FBI agent assigned to protect Sherry Pierce and her son from her psychotic ex-boyfriend Lester, who's escaped from prison and is after her and the money from his last job. Scared, she flees to her grandmother's home but when Big Momma is called out of town before Sherry turns up, Turner disguises himself as a 350lb pensioner to take her place and be close to the action. Raja Gosnell's film mixes gross-out humour with tension as Lawrence revels in his dual comedy roles

programme.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
programme.desc: Robin Williams learns that keeping in touch with his children can be a drag in this hit comedy. Daniel Hillard (Williams) is an eccentric actor who specializes in dubbing voices for cartoon characters. Daniel is a kind man and a loving father, but he's a poor disciplinarian and a shaky role model. After throwing an elaborate and disastrous birthday party for his son, Daniel's wife Miranda (Sally Field) reaches the end of her patience and files for divorce. Daniel is heartbroken when Miranda is given custody of the children, and he's only allowed to visit them once a week. Determined to stay in contact with his kids, Daniel learns that Miranda is looking for a housekeeper, and with help from his brother Frank (Harvey Fierstein), a makeup artist, Daniel gets the job disguised as Mrs. Iphegenia Doubtfire, a stern but caring Scottish nanny. Daniel pulls off the ruse so well that neither his ex-wife nor his children recognize him, and in the process, he learns how to be the good parent he should have been all along. However, Daniel also has to deal with the little matter of Miranda's new boyfriend, Stu (Pierce Brosnan)

programme.title: Futurama
programme.desc: A Bicyclops Built for Two. The Professor goes online using AOL, which has turned into a virtual reality experience. While in a chat room, Leela meets Alcazar, who claims to be a cyclops. She visits his planet and learns that they are the last two living cyclopses from the planet Cyclopia. After they spend the night together, Alcazar starts acting like a real jerk and the episode turns into a parody of Married...With Children with Alcazar as Al Bundy and Leela as Peggy Bundy . She accepts his marriage proposal while Fry and Bender find out that Alcazar is not a cyclops, but a shapeshifting alien who already proposed to four other women. It turns out he was just looking for wives to clean his castles while he made money by letting people watch

programme.title: Futurama
programme.sub-title: How Hermes Requisitioned His Groove Back
programme.desc: How Hermes Requisitioned His Groove Back. Leela invites her old co-workers from the cryogenics lab over for a game of poker. When Bender uses x-ray specs to cheat, Leela's friends beat him up and inadvertently destroy Hermes' office. The anal-retentive Central Bureaucracy officer Morgan Proctor (voice of Nora Dunn) sees Hermes negligence and suspends him, appointing herself to take his place. Dr. Zoidberg suggests that Hermes spend some time at a health spa, but it turns out to be a slave labor camp. Meanwhile, Morgan tries to shape up the Planet Express offices and starts up a secret affair with Fry when she reveals her attraction to his slovenly ways. When Bender catches them, Morgan downloads his brain onto a disc and sends it to Central Bureaucracy. Finally, Hermes comes back and straightens everything out

programme.title: Futurama
programme.desc: A Clone of My Own. Professor Farnsworth's time for retirement is here. He decides to create his own clone, whom he names Cubert, to extend his life. Soon afterwards, he realises his creation is another failed experiment and decides to accept his fate

programme.title: Futurama
programme.desc: The Deep South. Fry meets a beautiful mermaid and the Planet Express team discovers the lost city of Atlanta!

programme.title: Shallow Hal
programme.desc: Jack Black continues his march to stardom with this typical Farrelly brothers blend of broad comedy and a heartfelt message. Black is Hal Larsen, a shallow man rapidly approaching middle age whose superficiality can be attributed to his father's deathbed admonition to only date young, beautiful women. Hal and his best friend, Mauricio (Jason Alexander), have taken the advice to heart, but Hal finds all of his physically impressive girlfriends consistently lacking in other qualities that would make them ideal mates. When he bumps into self-help guru Tony Robbins (playing himself), the motivational entrepreneur is intrigued by Hal's predicament and hypnotizes him so that he'll only see the inner beauty of women. Hal is quickly smitten with Rosemary Shanahan (Gwyneth Paltrow), a blonde Peace Corps volunteer who's tenderhearted, funny, and intelligent. She is also gorgeous and meets Hal's basic criteria of outer perfection, but what he doesn't realize is that Robbins' spell is working and he cannot see that Rosemary actually weights 300 pounds. When Mauricio is finally able to snap Hal out of his charmed state, Hal's in love with the inwardly perfect woman and must overcome his obsession with beauty. The script for Shallow Hal (2001) was developed when Peter Farrelly enjoyed the humorous letters written to a mutual friend by Sean Moynihan, a computer software executive who followed the filmmaker's advice to take up screenwriting

programme.desc: Housewarming. Potluck dishes are prepared for a housewarming party. Included: campanelle-pasta salad; savory biscotti; mangoes and raspberries in prosecco syrup

programme.title: Giada at Home
programme.desc: Mini Me. Giada makes mini versions of her favorite recipes for a party. On the menu: antipasto calzones; roasted fingerling potatoes with lemon-parsley aioli; ricotta-cinnamon meatballs; and chocolate-honey-almond tartlets

programme.title: Giada at Home
programme.desc: Not Your Grandmother's Tea Party. Giada puts a modern spin on a tea party. On the menu: tre fagioli with fregola; open-faced tuna sandwiches with white bean spread; lavender-chamomile spritzer; and milk-and-honey cake

programme.title: Food Network Star
programme.desc: A New Food Network Star. The final three watch their pilots with Giada De Laurentiis and Bobby Flay. One winner is selected to shoot their very own show on Food Network in the Season 12 finale

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Eating for One. On the menu: gazpacho; pasta with pancetta and leeks; chile rellenos; and bruschetta

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Frontier Family. It's all about school days and Sundays on the ranch, with more slices of frontier family life. Ree is making incredible malted milk chocolate chip cookies for a field trip to a local museum

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Burgers, Rings and Fries. Burgers, onion rings and fries are tasted in San Francisco, Minneapolis, St. Paul and Ann Arbor, Mich. Included: stuffed burgers; vinegar-blanched hand-cut fries; sliders

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Brain Freeze. Guy Fieri rolls out for ice cream - Triple D style: At the Norfolk, Virginia Drive-In where they say their founder invented the waffle cone in the early 1900s and they're still making them by hand today; At the Arizona creamery making Italian gelato in flavors from tiramisu to apple pie (made with real pie); And the New Orleans favorite doing huge sundaes and home made ice cream in more than 400 flavors

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Viewer's Choice. Guy Fieri goes to some great places viewers have suggested: a sixty year-old legacy in Florida where even the fish goes in the smoker; a Hawaiian paradise outside of Seattle, serving up authentic island food that has the mainlanders hooked; and a Tiki Bar in Minneapolis where they'll fry anything and the drinks have umbrellas

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Real Deal BBQ. Guy Fieri tracks down real-deal barbecue from a down-home BBQ shack on the median of Los Angeles highway; to a fusion barbecue joint in Chicago, where they're making two different kinds of sauce their own way every day, to just outside of Kansas City, BBQ central, where a tech guy-turned restaurant owner is cooking up whole hogs

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Better Than Ever. Time-tested eateries are visited, including a restaurant in Alabama that's served up legendary soft-shell-crab sandwiches for more than 80 years. Other stops include an Italian favorite in Omaha for homemade sausage; and one of Atlanta's oldest restaurants, where the menu ranges from Southern comfort food to kangaroo tenderloin

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Comfort Food. A search for quality comfort food leads to a Baltimore eatery for French toast; a café in Huntington, W.Va., for corn bread; and a third-generation family-run joint in San Antonio for a Texas take on comfort cooking

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Regional Favorites. The host samples regional specialties, including a horseshoe sandwich in Springfield, Ill.; and red-and-green chili in Santa Fe, N.M

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In the Family. Family-run eateries in Baltimore, Miami and Salt Lake City are featured. Appearing: Duff Goldman ("Ace of Cakes")

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: And the Kicker Is... Guy Fieri rolls in for things done a little differently: In Columbia, South Carolina, a burger place doing hand made patties with a southern kicker ... fried green tomatoes; In Buffalo, New York, a corner diner serving everything with a side of home made bread, baked fresh daily; And in Berkeley, California, a diner that's redefining scrapple

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Globetrottin'. This trip Guy pulls in for a world of taste. In Los Angeles, California, an El Salvadoran place making traditional stuffed tortillas and a pork stew called Adobada. In Reno, Nevada, a Basque joint serving oxtail bourguignon family style. And in Jacksonville, FL, a tapas café doing scratch made Spanish chorizo with honey sautéed pears

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Multitaskers. In Dundalk, Maryland, a Greek diner is decked out in neon and serving up family recipes. In Oxnard, California, a joint is baking, brewing, and cooking all in the same restaurant. And in Charleston, South Carolina, southern heritage meets culinary creativity at this mom and pop joint, with favorites like deep fried pork chops with sweet and spicy pepper jelly

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Hometown Haunts. This trip, Guy's takin' a spin through the town favorites. In Chatham, N.J., the real deal Italian joint bakin' up some righteous fried chicken, arancini balls, and the decadent sacred swine sandwich. And in Olympia, Wash., the homestyle spot cranking out creole oyster benedict, a colorful winter squash and apple hash and a unique blueberry crunch roller

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Aces of Authenticity. This trip, Guy's hittin' up some joints that are authentic to the bone. In Santa Fe, there's a farm-raised Chimayan owner turning out traditional dishes

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Pubs and Grub. This trip, Guy's grubbin' at some popular hangouts. In St. Louis, the classic British pub cooking up gourmet grilled cheese and a porchetta masterpiece. In Kill Devil Hills, N.C., the brewing station serving righteous shrimp and grits alongside craft made beers. And in Cranston, R.I., the corner spot dishin' out the pasta loaded with little neck clams

In the first half-hour, police detectives investigate crimes and arrest suspects, while in the second half-hour, the focus shifts to the complications of the justice system. See why it is well on its way to becoming thelongest running primetime drama ever to air in U.S. television history

Well, it seems that someone is proposing a two-cent beer tax--or maybe it's a two percent beer tax, depending on which part of the episode you're watching. And if they can't defeat this tax, there's a viable alternative, involving looting and pillaging. . .and maybe drinking. Real-life KNBC reporter Cynthia Allison appears as herself, while Married. . .With Children cocreator Ron Leavitt and executive producer Larry Jacobson make cameo appearances

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Big Happy Family
programme.desc: Adapted from the multi-talented playwright/filmmaker's hit stage play of the same name, Tyler Perry's Madea's Big Happy Family finds the cantankerous family matriarch using her unique brand of tough love to help her family weather some particularly rough waters. Madea's niece Shirley has received a frightening medical diagnosis, and she's having a hard time figuring out how to break the news to the rest of the family. Unfortunately she's not the only one in the midst of a crisis, either: Kimberly is suffering from anger issues that are threatening to destroy her marriage; Tammy's marital problems are being compounded by her disobedient children; and Byron is struggling to stay out of the drug trade after spending two years behind bars. Later, as a skeleton in the family closet pops into the picture, Madea and Aunt Bam show that love and laugher can help to overcome even the biggest obstacles

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy is at his funniest as he plays multiple roles in this outrageous farce about a shy nerd who is married to an obese shrew, but gets a second chance to win the heart of his childhood sweetheart

programme.title: Married...With Children

Al (Ed O'Neill) hopes to fulfill a lifelong dream in death: He wants to be buried next to his childhood idol, movie-cowboy sidekick Fuzzy McGee, and Fuzzy's mule Dadgummit. This explains why Al has purchased a cemetery plot that does not accommodate wife Peggy (Katey Sagal). The best scene involves a coffin-shopping excursion, with Dan Castellaneta, aka the voice of Homer Simpson, as a funeral director

programme.title: Married...With Children

Well, that MIGHT have happened had not Bud's parents Al (Ed O'Neill) and Peg (Katey Sagal) found and spent the money (and they didn't even bother to warn Bud with a "We're spending our kid's college fund" bumper sticker). This episode appeared the same week that star Katey Sagal showed up on the cover of TV Guide--in a Santa Claus outfit!

programme.title: Seinfeld

While visiting his grandmother, Jerry hears about some money that Uncle Leo was supposed to have given to Jerry's aunt years ago, thereby creating a fiasco involving Jerry's father. Meanwhile, Jerry is uncomfortable with all of the acquaintances who suddenly want to kiss him hello, Kramer implements his plan to put pictures of each tenant up in the apartment building lobby, and George and Elaine both experience frustrations with a physical therapist whose hair is stuck in the past. Wendie Malick of HBO's Dream On and NBC's Just Shoot Me guest stars as Wendy, the physical therapist. Originally airing February 16, 1995, "The Kiss Hello" was the 14th episode taped for the show's sixth season, despite being the 16th one shown

Meanwhile, Elaine formulates a plan to convince her gay, male friend to "switch teams" despite his familiarity with his team's equipment, George begins wearing a toupee only to be set up on a date with a bald woman, and Kramer gets a job as a police lineup stand-in. programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Vin Diesel opted to not appear in the sequel to the film the shot him to stardom in the first place, The Fast and the Furious. With the character of Dominic Toretto out of the picture, 2 Fast 2 Furious concentrates exclusively on the latest exploits of undercover agent Brian O'Connor, played by Paul Walker. In addition, with director Rob Cohen passing, producers have added a dash of credibility to the sequel by hiring John Singleton to helm. What does completely remain from the first film is the presence of fast-living underground street-racing gangs. Moving from Los Angeles to Miami, O'Connor is looking to redeem himself after the events of the first movie, so he again goes undercover to infiltrate another group of thuggish car enthusiasts. This time around he's enlisted the help of ex-con Roman Pierce (Tyrese) and fellow agent Monica Celemente (Eva Mendes) to bring down Carter Verone (Cole Hauser), an importer/exporter who heads up a massive drug trafficking operation. Heading up the supporting cast are hip-hop stars Ludacris and Fabolous

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Static. Dean Jagger stars as Ed Lindsay, a cranky middle-aged man living in a boarding house with several other old-timers, including his former fiancée Vinnie Brown (Carmen Mathews). Fed up with television, Ed squirrels himself away in his room, where he begins tooling around with the antique radio he's found in the cellar. Before long, he is receiving broadcasts from the 1930s and 1940s -- live broadcasts, not reruns. Having opened a window to the past, Ed desperately tries to correct several mistakes he's made in life. Scripted by Charles Beaumont from a story by OCee Ritch, "Static" was one of six videotaped Twilight Zone episodes and was originally telecast March 10, 1961 (and yes, that voice emanating from Ed's old-time radio does belong to future Hogan's Heroes star Bob Crane)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Fight. A teenage girl's murder appears to be connected to the world of ultimate fighting when a fighter's DNA is found at the scene. But more evidence leads to two brothers, who could be responsible for the death

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Paternity. The SVU put out a media appeal for information on a youngster found on the streets of New York covered in someone else's blood. The child's father turns up to collect him, but tests reveal he is not the biological parent - a development that makes Stabler doubt whether Kathy's unborn child is really his

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Snitch. A Nigerian polygamist suspects one of his wives was murdered because of his testimony in another crime case, and a website is found naming other potential witnesses. Despite this discovery, Benson and Stabler believe the man's cultural tradition was the motive for the killing

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Streetwise. A wealthy teenager's murder leads detectives to the charismatic and violent leader of a homeless group calling themselves a family. The probe turns up evidence suggesting the man may be responsible for other deaths, including those of his own "children" and first wife

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Signature. A body found in Central Park appears to be the latest victim of a serial killer, forcing Benson to work with an FBI agent familiar with the murder's profile. But the agent also has a personal interest in the case: her mentor committed suicide over his frustration at not being able to stop the deaths

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Unorthodox. An investigation into the sexual assault of a Jewish boy (Braeden Lemasters) uncovers a disturbing pattern of abuse when more victims come forward after a suspect is named. The case is hampered by the boy's secretive and protective religious community and a grandstanding defense lawyer (Rhea Perlman) who views the trial as an opportunity to push her own agenda

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Inconceivable. A robbery at a sperm bank has Benson and Stabler racing to recover fertilized embryos before it is too late. The investigation into a long list of suspects eventually leads to a pair of publicity-seeking extremists, and to Benson's personal fear of missing out on motherhood. Janine Turner and Mark Moses guest star

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Undercover. Police drama series about an elite sex crime unit based in New York. Benson and Stabler find that a rape case is far more complicated than it had at first appeared so Benson goes undercover in a women's prison to gather more evidence

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Closet. An investment banker is found dead and suspicion falls on his boyfriend, a professional football player desperate to keep his sexuality a secret

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Authority. Police drama series about an elite sex crime unit based in New York. The team crosses swords with a quick-witted man who charms hapless people into committing crimes. (HD)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Trade. When a pregnant woman's body is found in a burned-out building, the investigators suspect a family of coffee importers

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Cold. Police drama series about an elite sex crime unit based in New York. The team starts to fall apart. Tutuola requests a transfer, Lake shoots a suspect in cold blood and ADA Novak is caught trying to pervert the course of justice. (HD)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Joust Between Friends. During a sabbatical from school, Dorothy (Bea Arthur) seeks out a part-time job. Blanche (Rue McClanahan) persuades the museum where she works to take on Dorothy temporarily -- only to regret her generosity when Dorothy, and not Blanche, is assigned to organize an important banquet. Meanwhile, Rose (Betty White) picks up a stray dog at the supermarket, leading to a variety of negative reactions from her housemates -- and an effort to spike the mutt's water dish with sherry

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Love, Rose. When Rose places a newspaper ad seeking a male companion, Dorothy and Blanche take pity on her and contrive an answer from an interested man named Isaac Newton

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Perspectives on Christmas. Four stories are told from four perspectives as the Crane clan prepares for Christmas

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: Where Every Bloke Knows Your Name
programme.desc: Where Every Bloke Knows Your Name. Daphne invites Frasier to the English pub she likes to hang out at, where Frasier proceeds to get far too comfortable for her liking

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Ain't Nobody's Business if 'I Do'. After months of dating the acerbic and outspoken Sherry Dempsey (Marsha Mason), Martin (John Mahoney) decides it is time to pop the question. This does not rest well with Martin's sons, Frasier (Kelsey Grammer) and Niles (David Hyde Pierce), who have never warmed up to Sherry -- and are even less enamored of her once they learn some shocking facts about her past. Without giving away the ending of this episode, suffice to say that the cast of Frasier will soon be "lighter" by one

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Zoo Story. As tough contract negotiations loom, Frasier insists to Bebe Glazer that he's sticking with his new straight-arrow agent

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Maris Counselor. Niles is excited that things have been going better with Maris since they started seeing a new marriage guidance counsellor - but he's in for a surprise

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Ski Lodge. Mixed-up romantic maneuvers snowball at a ski lodge

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Teacher's Pet. When Sam returns to school to get his high-school diploma, he does so well that Diane suspects that it's not his work in the classroom that is getting him the grades

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: The Mail Goes to Jail. Norm helps out Cliff by delivering the mail when the latter falls ill. But his samaritan act is rewarded by a spell in jail when he's accused of tampering with the letters

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy Hires a Maid. Overwhelmed by the responsibilities of motherhood, Lucy (Lucille Ball) decides to hire a maid named Mrs. Porter (Verna Felton). In preparation for her new servant's arrival, Lucy meticulously prepares a list of do's and don'ts to help Mrs. Porter perform her job more efficiently. Imagine our heroine's surprise when Mrs. Porter imperiously descends upon the Ricardo household with her own list of what she expects Lucy to do -- and not do. And imagine Lucy's agony when she can't summon up the nerve to fire the overbearing maid, who within a few hours of her arrival has completely taken over the Ricardo household. This episode marks the first appearance of twin infants Richard Lee Simmons and Ronald Lee Simmons as Little Ricky

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Ricardos Change Apartments. When a larger apartment becomes available in the building, Lucy (Lucille Ball) decides it is time to increase the Ricardos' living space -- for the sake of Little Ricky, of course. Naturally, Big Ricky (Desi Arnaz) is opposed to moving, especially after learning that the new apartment would cost an additional 20 dollars per month. Undaunted, Lucy stages an elaborate ruse to fool Ricky into thinking that their present apartment is only slightly more cramped than your average hall closet. But the fun really begins when Lucy and Ethel (Vivian Vance) decide to avoid additional expenses by handling the moving chores themselves

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy Is Matchmaker. Lucy plays matchmaker when she meets a friend of the Mertzes (Hal March) who happens to be an eligible bachelor. His line of work? He's a lingerie salesman, a fact that just might get her (and Ethel) into trouble when her matchmaking efforts inevitably backfire. Man in Hotel Corridor: Phil Arnold

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Indian Show. Lucy wants to play an Indian in Ricky's act. He won't hear of it, of course, but what really galls her is that the Mertzes will be in it. What to do? A little backstage dealing, strap Little Ricky into a papoose and it's on with the show. Juanita: Carol Richards. Jessy: Jerry Hausner

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy Wants New Furniture. Now that the Ricardos are living in a new apartment, Lucy (Lucille Ball) figures that it's time to replace the old living room furniture. Without the permission or knowledge of husband Ricky (Desi Arnaz), Lucy purchases a new sofa and coffee table, using the old furniture as down payment for the 299-dollar price tag. The trick now is to prevent Ricky from finding out about the transaction until Lucy can figure out the "right time" to tell him -- and the way things are going, the "right time" may well be 1963! Somehow or other, this situation segues into an even funnier one, wherein Lucy tries to curb her financial "'stravagances" by making her own dress and giving herself a home permanent

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy's Last Birthday. More sensitive than usual -- if such a thing is possible -- Lucy (Lucille Ball) becomes convinced that everyone has forgotten her birthday. Wandering disconsolately into Central Park, lonely Lucy is "adopted" by a lachrymose benevolent group called The Friends of the Friendless. With her new comrades in tow, Lucy angrily storms into the Tropicana to tell Ricky (Desi Arnaz) off for his negligence -- only to get the surprise of her life (which, by her count, has lasted a mere 29 years!). This is the one and only episode in which Desi Arnaz sings the I Love Lucy theme song, with special lyrics written for the occasion by Harold Adamson

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Ricardos Change Apartments. When a larger apartment becomes available in the building, Lucy (Lucille Ball) decides it is time to increase the Ricardos' living space -- for the sake of Little Ricky, of course. Naturally, Big Ricky (Desi Arnaz) is opposed to moving, especially after learning that the new apartment would cost an additional 20 dollars per month. Undaunted, Lucy stages an elaborate ruse to fool Ricky into thinking that their present apartment is only slightly more cramped than your average hall closet. But the fun really begins when Lucy and Ethel (Vivian Vance) decide to avoid additional expenses by handling the moving chores themselves

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Camping Trip. Lucy fears that she and Ricky don't have enough in common, so she decides to pursue one of his interests: camping. Ricky and Fred don't want her (or Ethel) horning in on their summer retreat, so Ricky decides to take her on a "trial run" in the woods and make her life miserable. Guess whose life is made miserable? Jerry: Jerry Hausner. Clubwomen: Doris Singleton, June Whitney

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy Is Matchmaker. Lucy plays matchmaker when she meets a friend of the Mertzes (Hal March) who happens to be an eligible bachelor. His line of work? He's a lingerie salesman, a fact that just might get her (and Ethel) into trouble when her matchmaking efforts inevitably backfire. Man in Hotel Corridor: Phil Arnold

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.sub-title: Ricky and Fred Are TV Fans
programme.desc: Ricky and Fred Are TV Fans. Lucy doesn't like being a TV-boxing widow, so she and Ethel stalk out of the house to a cafe---where everyone's glued to the boxing on TV. Next stop: the police station, but not at their instigation. Cop: Allen Jenkins. Desk Sergeant: Frank Nelson. Counterman: Larry Dobkin

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy Wants New Furniture. Now that the Ricardos are living in a new apartment, Lucy (Lucille Ball) figures that it's time to replace the old living room furniture. Without the permission or knowledge of husband Ricky (Desi Arnaz), Lucy purchases a new sofa and coffee table, using the old furniture as down payment for the 299-dollar price tag. The trick now is to prevent Ricky from finding out about the transaction until Lucy can figure out the "right time" to tell him -- and the way things are going, the "right time" may well be 1963! Somehow or other, this situation segues into an even funnier one, wherein Lucy tries to curb her financial "'stravagances" by making her own dress and giving herself a home permanent

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Never Do Business with Friends. The truth inherent in the title of this episode is vividly illustrated when the Ricardos sell their old washing machine to the Mertzes. The machine immediately malfunctions, whereupon Fred (William Frawley) and Ethel (Vivian Vance) demand that Lucy (Lucille Ball) and Ricky (Desi Arnaz) cancel the bill of sale, which amounts to 35 dollars. Lucy and Ricky refuse, insisting that since the Mertzes now own the washer, they are obliged to pay up. Not one but two zany slapstick set pieces ensue, concluding with a memorable climactic struggle on a second-story porch. This was the final episode of I Love Lucy's second season

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: 'Twas the Nightmare Before Christmas. Dorothy returns home from Christmas shopping to find out Sophia has been using her credit cards- and the girls are held at gun-point by Santa

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sisters. Dorothy is all set to give Sophia the birthday surprise of her life- she is flying her sister over from Sicily. Does Dorothy understand why they haven't spoken in years?

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.sub-title: The Stan Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: The Stan Who Came to Dinner. When Dorothy's ex-husband turns up out of the blue a few days before he is about to undergo heart surgery, Sophia suggests he stay with them while he recovers from his operation

programme.title: The Golden Girls

programme.desc: A demonstration from mentalist and magician Oz Pearlman; a recipe for blackened cauliflower; tips on wearing falls trends; unusual pets; a homemade cloud light; a handmade planter; products designed to make one feel like a mermaid

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Lost Ones. Part 1 of two. Charles tries to find a home for two children orphaned by a wagon accident. James Cooper: Jason Bateman. Cassandra Cooper: Missy Francis. Garvey: Merlin Olsen. Charles: Michael Landon. Albert: Matthew Laborteaux

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Lost Ones. In the conclusion of a two-part story, Rev. Alden (Dabbs Greer) finds a foster home for the orphaned Cooper children. Charles (Michael Landon) has a bad feeling about this setup -- a feeling that is borne out when it is revealed that the children's new guardians merely want to use them as cheap labor. The kids run away, whereupon Charles finds them -- agreeing to adopt them if it is humanly possible. Jason Bateman and Missy Francis join the regular cast as James and Cassandra in this, the final episode of Little House on the Prairie's seventh season

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Reincarnation of Nellie. The Olesons adopt a little girl, Nancy, who looks and acts like Nellie

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Reincarnation of Nellie. Nancy tricks her brother Willie into locking a classroom rival, Belinda Stevens, in the ice shed, so Nancy could play the lead role in an upcoming musical

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Driving Lessons. While Vanessa tries to bond with Eve by teaching her how to drive, Mandy has a bone to pick with Mike over the amount of work he's giving Kyle

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Pledging. Vanessa encourages Mandy to join a sorority, which could lead to the end of her romance with Kyle. Elsewhere, Ed pretends to be a loading-dock employee in order to investigate productivity problems

programme.desc: Adoptable kittens compete in a variety of sports, including gymnastics, volleyball and wrestling. Beth Stern hosts and Mary Carillo and David Frei serve as announcers. Included: appearances by Lance Bass, Gabrielle Reece and Charlie White

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Bad Choices. Frankie and Mike contemplate selling their house when it requires major repairs. Meanwhile, Axl fakes an illness in order to stay home from school, and then pretends he's had a speedy recovery; and Sue volunteers to do a school skit about safe driving

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Halloween II. Sue's juvenile Halloween costume isn't a hit with the boys at school, so she turns to her dad for advice about guys. Meanwhile, Frankie chaperones a trick-or-treating adventure for Brick's social-skills group; and Axl plays a Halloween prank

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: 'Twas the Nightmare Before Christmas. The girls plan to leave Miami for Christmas and spend the holidays with their individual families. Alas, a series of near-surrealistic delays and disasters befall our heroines as they try to carry out their plans -- and a hostage-taking Santa Claus (Terry Kiser) is only part of the scenario. One of the best moments occurs near the beginning of the episode, when Blanche (Rue McClanahan) receives a very special gift, "celebrating" her long and ever-growing list of gentlemen callers

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sisters. Dorothy plans to fly Sophia's sister over from Sicily for a surprise birthday present of a lifetime. But can Rose keep a secret?

programme.desc: The Stan Who Came to Dinner. When Dorothy's ex-husband turns up out of the blue a few days before he is about to undergo heart surgery, Sophia suggests he stay with them while he recovers from his operation

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The Actor. Dorothy, Blanche and Rose all fail to become the leading lady when a handsome television actor appears at their local community theatre. But each thinks she has become his special lady off-stage

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Room Service. Lilith arrives shattered and needy because her husband has left her. But Frasier finds her vulnerability "highly desirable."

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Beware of Greeks. Frasier's Greek cousin, Nikos, invites the Cranes to his wedding, even though Nikos' mother, Zora, is Frasier's sworn enemy after his meddling changed her son's life

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Perfect Guy. Bill Campbell guest stars as Dr. Clint Webber, a new "call-in" radio personality hired by station KACL. Dr. Webber's slick, smooth delivery and flawless dispensation of advice pleases everyone at the station -- everyone, of course, but rival radio shrink Dr. Frasier Crane (Kelsey Grammer), who worries that the "perfect" Webber will end up as his permanent replacement. Elsewhere, Niles (David Hyde Pierce) must straighten things out when his dad Martin (John Mahoney) is ejected from a gourmet pet-food shop

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Bad Dog. Bulldog is hailed as a hero during a hold-up at the coffee shop, when in fact he is anything but

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier Gotta Have It. When Frasier begins dating a beautiful woman, he has trouble accepting that the relationship is largely built on physical attraction and seeks reassurance from those around him

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: First Date. Niles tries once again to tell Daphne of his feelings for her, and end up saying he's in love with the first name that comes into his head - Phyllis, his next door neighbour

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Bar Bet. A long-forgotten bet Sam once made with an old friend during a drinking binge may cost him his bar if he doesn't marry Jacqueline Bisset by midnight tomorrow

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Behind Every Great Man. A sharp reporter (Alison La Placa) doing a story on the Boston singles scene represents the ultimate challenge to Sam's reputation as a ladies man when she fails to fall for his smug, self-centered come-ons. Sam: Ted Danson. Diane: Shelley Long

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky's Life Story. A Life magazine spread on Ricky makes Lucy envious---and wanting to break into show biz all the more. Fred has an idea to get her off her kick: Show Lucy "how hard show business really is," he advises Ricky, who concocts a backbreaking "challenge dance" routine for her. That's only the beginning of this chapter of Lucy Ricardo's show-business career. Dance Instructor: Louis A. Nicoletti

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Girls Go into Business. Once again dreaming of unlimited wealth, Lucy (Lucille Ball) and Ethel (Vivian Vance) allow themselves to be bamboozled into buying Hansen's Dress Shop. The crafty owner of the shop (Mabel Paige) has convinced the girls that they have purchased a gold mine at a bargain price, but before long Lucy and Ethel realize that their "new" emporium -- which they rename three times in a single day -- is a financial bust. Thus, when a gentleman offers the girls three times what they paid for Hansen's to buy it away from them, they jump at the chance...and, as usual, our heroines have leaped before they looked

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.sub-title: Lucy and Ethel Buy the Same Dress
programme.desc: Lucy and Ethel Buy the Same Dress. The women's club to which Lucy (Lucille Ball) and Ethel (Vivian Vance) belong manages to wangle an appearance on a local TV station. Inveigled into hosting the club's variety show, Ricky (Desi Arnaz) goes so far as to rehearse Lucy and Ethel in their big number, a rousing rendition of Cole Porter's "Friendship." Alas, the title of the song proves woefully inappropriate when, unbeknownst to one another, Lucy and Ethel buy identical dresses for their TV appearance

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Equal Rights. Lucy (Lucille Ball) and Ethel (Vivian Vance) demand that their husbands, Ricky (Desi Arnaz) and Fred (William Frawley), treat them as equals. The boys decide to teach the girls a lesson by taking them out to an expensive restaurant -- and then leaving them with the bill. Also in on the scheme is the restaurant's maître d' (Larry Dobkin), who orders Lucy and Ethel to work off their bill by washing dishes. Now it is Lucy and Ethel's turn to get even, which they do by concocting a scheme whereby Ricky and Fred will be persuaded that the restaurant is being robbed. Predictably, nothing goes quite as planned, and the evening ends with two of the main characters behind bars

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Baby Pictures. Lucy and Ricky promise not to brag about Little Ricky---at least, not as much as the Applebys brag about their Little Stevie. Ricky has a reason to insist on modesty: Charlie Appleby (Hy Averback) runs a TV station and Ricky wants to emcee a show on it. Caroline Appleby: Doris Singleton

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy Tells the Truth. Can Lucy go a whole day without telling one fib? Ricky and the Metzes bet her $100 that she can't. So it's a shame that she has a bridge game coming up (questions will concern her age, weight and hair color), and a TV-show audition, at which she's asked to list her talents. Casting Director: Charles Lane. Professor Flaconi: Mario Siletti

programme.desc: Satirical comedian Ben Gleib, dubbed the "next big thing" on Esquire's comedian list, performs his first one-hour comedy special where he tackles social media, singledom, vegetarians and everything in between

programme.title: Margaret Cho: psyCHO
programme.desc: Three-time Grammy® and Emmy® nominated comedian Margaret Cho performs in front of a live audience in this provocative and hilarious comedy special event, tackling off-limits issues from Boko Haram to female empowerment with her razor sharp insight and wit

programme.title: Tooken
programme.desc: In this spoof of the 'Taken' action-film franchise, an ex-CIA agent is now working as a mall security guard who keeps finding his things are being taken from him, including his wife, his dog and his daughter's virginity. With the help of his elderly mother, he must battle his nemesis to free his family. Stars Margaret Cho

programme.title: W. Kamau Bell: Semi-Prominent Negro
programme.desc: Comedy special featuring socio-political comedian W. Kamau Bell, who brings his characteristically biting and hilarious take on the real issues of contemporary America from gentrification to raising his family in a post-Obama nation. Morgan Spurlock directs

programme.title: Ben Gleib: Neurotic Gangster
programme.desc: Satirical comedian Ben Gleib, dubbed the "next big thing" on Esquire's comedian list, performs his first one-hour comedy special where he tackles social media, singledom, vegetarians and everything in between

programme.title: Heartless
programme.desc: In this chilling supernatural tale, a talented young photographer with a disfiguring birthmark discovers a world of reptilian monsters posing as street gangs on the streets of London, who inflict violence on the innocent and offer him everything he's ever dreamed of, but at a deadly price

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: A musician is left reeling after her boyfriend strays but her life takes a turn when a disgraced record-label exec stumbles upon her performing in the East Village, and a chance encounter leads to a wondrous mutual transformation, set to the soundtrack of summer in New York City. Stars Keira Knightley and Mark Ruffalo

programme.title: Passion Of Mind
programme.desc: Demi Moore stars in this romantic fantasy as two very different women who seem to be the same person in two different places, France and New York. Is each the figment of the other's imagination, or is something more powerful and wonderfully supernatural going on? William Fichtner, Joss Ackland, Peter Riegert and Stellan Skarsgard costar in this moving, memorable film from French director Alain Berliner ("Ma Vie en Rose")

programme.title: Black Filmmaker Showcase: Hit Me
programme.desc: A man must convince the professional assassin he hired to let him live in this short film from director Steve Minor

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Filmed over 12 years with the same cast, this groundbreaking Richard Linklater film is the story of growing up seen through the eyes of a boy who literally goes from a child to a young adult before our eyes. Features Patricia Arquette in her Oscar® winning role with Ethan Hawke and Ellar Coltrane

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order

programme.title: The Dramatics (A Comedy)
programme.desc: When an out-of-work actress unexpectedly lands a starring role in the sexually explicit mini-series adaptation of a best-selling erotic novel, her aimless, stoner boyfriend does his best to be supportive. But when her volatile, Oscar® winning co-lead takes "rehearsals" too far, her dream job becomes her boyfriend's worst nightmare and the couple is forced to decide whether or not their relationship is worth fighting for. Stars Pablo Schreiber

programme.title: Jonah Hill / Alan Arkin
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Jonah Hill and Alan Arkin(c)

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: The dorky head of a high school reunion committee (Jack Black) travels to Los Angeles to track down the most popular guy from his graduating class and convince him to go to the reunion, in an obsessive pursuit of approval and recognition that takes over his life. Also stars Kathryn Hahn and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Lost in the Sun
programme.desc: A small time criminal past finds an unlikely accomplice in a newly orphaned teenage boy, conning him into a dangerous cross country trip where they undertake a series of robberies and hope the past won't catch up with them

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel

programme.title: Heartless
programme.desc: In this chilling supernatural tale, a talented young photographer with a disfiguring birthmark discovers a world of reptilian monsters posing as street gangs on the streets of London, who inflict violence on the innocent and offer him everything he's ever dreamed of, but at a deadly price

programme.title: Dreamcatcher
programme.desc: Documentary about a former Chicago prostitute who helps women and teenage girls break the cycle of abuse and exploitation - and lays bare the hidden violence that devastates the lives of young women, their families and the communities they live in

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: This highly acclaimed, Oscar(R) winning independent drama marked the extraordinary sophomore effort of writer and director Sofia Coppola, who crafts a resonant, understated drama about a movie star (Bill Murray) visiting Tokyo to appear in a liquor commercial, who befriends the lonely, hotel-bound wife (Scarlett Johansson) of a celebrity photographer. Together, the two lost, culturally adrift, insomniac Americans become platonic soul mates, exploring the city and discovering a kindred spirit to combat their shared isolation

programme.title: Alec Mapa: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Actor and comedian Alec Mapa's heartfelt and hilarious film of his one-man show exploring the challenges of adopting a five-year-old foster child with his husband. Includes behind-the-scenes footage of his family's home life on a busy show day

programme.title: Jessabelle
programme.desc: Returning to her childhood home in Louisiana to recuperate from a horrific car accident, a young girl comes face to face with a long-tormented spirit that has no intention of letting her escape

programme.title: Turbulence 2
programme.desc: In this action packed drama, a therapy group who have completed a program to overcome their severe fear of flying are the victims of an airplane hijacking. With the pilot dead and the hijackers threatening to blow them all away, one of the passengers must race against the clock to bring the plane safely to the ground

programme.title: The Last One
programme.desc: A documentary uncovering the birth of The AIDS Memorial Quilt, which became a galvanizing force against bigotry and a flag in the fight for a cure. This moving story explores the quest to sew on the last panel, representing the final death and an end to the disease. Features archival footage, vérité scenes and interviews with the quilt makers and activists

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx stars as the American legend Ray Charles in this musical drama that is an unflinching portrait of the soulful singer's battle to overcome addiction, fight segregation and revolutionize the music as he transformed into one of the country's most beloved performers. Also stars Kerry Washington

programme.title: Match
programme.desc: Patrick Stewart stars as a master dance teacher and choreographer with a lifetime of memories, who is interviewed by a young couple and unexpectedly forced to confront the painful decisions he thought he left in the past

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: After a lifetime of training in swordsmanship and hand-to-hand combat, the world's most dangerous fighter flees his homeland to start a new life in the American west. But soon the hunter becomes the hunted, and the legendary warrior must wage a fierce, all-out battle against a renegade gang of outlaws and a pack of murderous assassins from his past. Stars Kate Bosworth and Academy Award® winner Geoffrey Rush

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Remake of the classic blaxploitation action flick starring Samuel L. Jackson as John Shaft, a New York cop seeking a murder witness (Toni Collette) who can finger a spoiled construction business heir (Christian Bale) for the racially motivated murder of a black student. In the meantime, the wealthy killer has enlisted the aid of a drug dealer (Jeffrey Wright) who wants to move into big league narcotics trafficking. Vanessa L. Williams and Busta Rhymes costar

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Daddy's Little Girls
programme.desc: A hard working, blue collar mechanic sues for custody of his three daughters, and falls in love with his beautiful lawyer in this domestic drama from writer and director Tyler Perry, starring Idris Elba, Gabrielle Union and Louis Gossett Jr

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx stars as the American legend Ray Charles in this musical drama that is an unflinching portrait of the soulful singer's battle to overcome addiction, fight segregation and revolutionize the music as he transformed into one of the country's most beloved performers. Also stars Kerry Washington

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a 19-year-old girl finds herself plagued by nightmarish visions and can't shake the sensation that someone or something is following her. As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Remake of the classic blaxploitation action flick starring Samuel L. Jackson as John Shaft, a New York cop seeking a murder witness (Toni Collette) who can finger a spoiled construction business heir (Christian Bale) for the racially motivated murder of a black student. In the meantime, the wealthy killer has enlisted the aid of a drug dealer (Jeffrey Wright) who wants to move into big league narcotics trafficking. Vanessa L. Williams and Busta Rhymes costar

programme.title: Richard Pryor: Omit The Logic
programme.desc: Mike Epps, Richard Pryor Jr. and others recount the culture-defining influence of Richard Pryor - one of America's most brilliant, iconic comic minds - in this new documentary. Directed by Emmy(R)-winning filmmaker Marina Zenovich and executive produced by Roy Ackerman and Pryor's widow, Jennifer Pryor

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a small town amateur hockey team accepts a challenge to play against the New York Rangers, the entire population must put their petty differences aside and pull together as their small town becomes the center of a nationally televised event. Features an all-star cast, including Russel Crowe, Hank Azaria and Burt Reynolds

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: Mr. Holland's Opus
programme.desc: Richard Dreyfuss stars in this sentimental favorite as an aspiring composer who settles uncomfortably into a 30-year career as a high school music teacher, struggling to achieve his dreams while raising a deaf son and only slowly realizing the impact he has had on generations of students. Glenne Headly and Olympia Dukakis costar in this heartwarming drama

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A thriller based on a true story about a big city couple who go camping along a secluded Canadian trail and find themselves lost and at the mercy of the wild

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Clive Owen star in this sword-clashing adventure of a fallen warrior who rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: Two men are separated by time and united by their search for freedom in this tale of a slave escaping via the underground railroad in the 1800s and a sea captain setting sail one hundred year's earlier, with a ship full of slaves that will set in a motion an unstoppable legacy. Stars Cuba Gooding Jr

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn

programme.title: Fish and Bird
programme.desc: Ray finds himself in a holding pattern, waiting to see if Belikov will be released from prison. An art dealer invites Ray to a breast cancer benefit where he encounters some former clients. Teresa spirals into postpartum depression. Meanwhile, Mickey goes to great lengths to convince the DA that he was the one behind the Minassian massacre

programme.title: SCB30: Ortiz vs. Lopez
programme.desc: In celebration of its 30th anniversary, SHOWTIME CHAMPIONSHIP BOXING presents Victor Ortiz in a wild swinging, back and forth battle with Josesito Lopez that ended after nine rounds in a literally jawbreaking upset

programme.title: Showtime Championship Boxing: Mayweather vs. Maidana I (?)
Zodiac
programme.desc: A newspaper cartoonist becomes obsessed with solving San Francisco's infamous "Zodiac" serial killer case, and eventually closes in on a suspect after the case has long become cold in this fact-based thriller starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Mark Ruffalo, Robert Downey Jr. and Chloe Sevigny

programme.title: Mercenaries
programme.desc: When the president's daughter is captured and imprisoned while touring a war zone, a team of elite female commandos is assembled to infiltrate a women's prison and undertake a daring rescue

programme.title: Mystery, Alaska
programme.desc: When a small town amateur hockey team accepts a challenge to play against the New York Rangers, the entire population must put their petty differences aside and pull together as their small town becomes the center of a nationally televised event. programme.title: Split Decisions
programme.desc: The lives of three generations of pugilistic warriors merge in a flurry of corruption with this look at the raw-boned world of professional boxing starring Gene Hackman and a strong supporting cast that includes Craig Sheffer, Jeff Fahey, Jennifer Beals, John McLiam, Eddie Velez, Carmine Caridi and James Tolkan

programme.title: Sneakers
programme.desc: In this tech caper, an all-star cast of renegade computer hackers are blackmailed by the government into stealing a code-breaking machine from a mathematician but after the job is done, they realize they've got themselves into far more than they bargained for. Features Robert Redford, River Phoenix, Sidney Poitier and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: Miles To Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Short documentary chronicling the true story of famed musicians and the relationships they have with their roadies. Features music legends Chad Smith (Red Hot Chili Peppers), Chris Shiflett (Foo Fighters) and Jim James (My Morning Jacket), who speak candidly about their time on the road and the importance of the crew who work tirelessly to put the show together, as well as capturing a day behind-the-scenes with the crew of Pearl Jam

programme.title: Steve McQueen: The Man & Le Mans
programme.desc: Documentary following iconic movie actor/director Steve McQueen's journey to make 'the ultimate racing movie', Le Mans, in France in the 1970s, which interweaves present day interviews with his family members and production team with remarkable archive footage that goes behind the making of the film that would lead one of the most charismatic stars of all time to lose everything in the pursuit of a dream

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: In this psychological action-thriller, an elite group of the FBI's most talented young agents, skilled in reading the minds of elusive serial killers, is being intensively trained on a remote island. But they soon learn that there is a killer among them and they must find a way to get out alive. Stars Christian Slater and Val Kilmer

programme.title: Sneakers
programme.desc: In this tech caper, an all-star cast of renegade computer hackers are blackmailed by the government into stealing a code-breaking machine from a mathematician but after the job is done, they realize they've got themselves into far more than they bargained for. programme.desc: Deontay Wilder vs. Bermane Stiverne. Classic fight(c)

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation: Russell vs. Castaneda (R)
programme.desc: Elite featherweight Gary Russell Jr. returns to the ring to take on top prospect Roberto Castaneda. REPLAY

programme.title: Berto vs. Soto Karass (R)
programme.desc: Andre Berto (28-2, 22 KOs) steps into the ring with Jesus Soto Karass (27-8-3, 17 KOs) for a 12-round Welterweight bout. Live from the AT&T Center in San Antonio, Texas. REPLAY(c)

programme.title: Showtime Championship Boxing: Mayweather vs. Maidana I (?)
Showtime Championship Boxing: DeGale vs. Bute (R) (?)
60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: The first name in news magazines is the last word in sports. Jack Ford profiles the 75th Anniversary of the U.S. Naval Academy's Brigade Boxing Championships and its role in creating future military leaders. Plus, twenty-five years after "Friday Night Lights" exposed the grit of big time high school football Sharyn Alfonsi revisits some of its true-life characters in Odessa, Texas, and watches this year's team chase a dream. And Mo Rocca goes out on the high seas to report on one of the most lucrative deep sea fishing tournaments in the world

programme.title: War
programme.desc: A grieving FBI agent is bent on avenging the death of his partner by hunting down the assassin that pulled the trigger, but uncovers some disturbing secrets on his crusade for justice. Jason Statham and Jet Li star in this stylish action thriller with John Lone

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Writer and director Quentin Tarantino reinvigorated the noir crime drama with this wildly entertaining blockbuster that casts John Travolta and Samuel L. Jackson as hit-man partners whose meandering paths cross those of a powerful gangster (Ving Rhames), the latter's overdosing girlfriend (Uma Thurman), a desperate boxer (Bruce Willis) and a pair of stickup artists named Honeybunny (Amanda Plummer) and Pumpkin (Tim Roth). "Leaves viewers both exhilarated and exhausted - hearts racing and knuckles white from the ride." -Amazon.com

programme.title: Meru
programme.desc: In the high-stakes game of big-wall climbing, the Shark's Fin on Mount Meru may be the ultimate prize. In this documentary three close friends - who are among the world's best professional climbers - battle their complicated pasts, inner demons and nature's harshest elements in an attempt to confront what is arguably the most technically complicated and dangerous peak in the Himalayas - one that has never been scaled to completion

programme.title: Frank & Jesse
programme.desc: Outlaw brothers Frank and Jesse James seek revenge for their murdered brother and become infamous public enemies to the Union soldiers occupying their post-Civil War territory but legendary heroes to the downtrodden locals who cheer their bank-and-train-robbing antics. Rob Lowe, Bill Paxton and Randy Travis star in this Western action adventure

programme.title: Deterrence
programme.desc: While he's trapped in a diner during a freak Colorado snowstorm, the U.S. President (Kevin Pollak) debates strategy with his senior staff during an international crisis provoked by Iraq. Sean Astin, Timothy Hutton and Sheryl Lee Ralph costar in this debut feature from writer-director Rod Lurie ("The Contender")

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on actual events, a group of US soldiers is sent on a heroic mission to Somalia in 1993 as part of a UN peacekeeping operation. They must capture the top lieutenants of a Somali warlord, in order to quell the civil war and famine that is ravaging the country. Directed by Ridley Scott

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: From writer and director Craig Brewer comes this offbeat, Southern Gothic drama about a wild, nymphomaniacal young woman (Christina Ricci) who is imprisoned and broken of her "wickedness" by a kindly blues guitarist (Samuel L. Jackson), even as both suffer in different ways from loneliness and heartache. Justin Timberlake, S. Epatha Merkerson, David Banner and Clare Grant costar in this strange but riveting character study

programme.title: Sneakers
programme.desc: In this tech caper, an all-star cast of renegade computer hackers are blackmailed by the government into stealing a code-breaking machine from a mathematician but after the job is done, they realize they've got themselves into far more than they bargained for. Features Robert Redford, River Phoenix, Sidney Poitier and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: The Man Who Shook the Hand of Vicente Fernandez
programme.desc: Academy Award(R) winner Ernest Borgnine stars in this tale of a retired radio DJ who finds himself in a nursing home run by an evil henchman, giving him the chance to pursue his lifelong dream of heroism by leading the Latino staff in a revolt against the tyrannical owner

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Veracity
programme.desc: Two teenage girls are outed at high school for being gay and are faced with difficult choices about their friendship, their sexual identity and themselves in this short film directed by Seith Mann and written by Janaya Greene

programme.title: Black Filmmaker Showcase: Saturday Night Life
programme.desc: Writer-director Ava DuVernay's short drama concerns a poor, struggling single mother whose trip with her three children to a 99-cent store in Los Angeles becomes an unexpectedly uplifting family experience. Melissa DeSousa ("The Best Man") stars

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Adios, Para Siempre
programme.desc: A crime scene photographer is drawn into an ingenious game of images that could spell his doom in this short from filmmaker David Guillermo Barba

programme.title: The Discoverers
programme.desc: A washed up history professor takes his begrudging teenage kids on a road trip to a conference, in the hope of getting his career back on track but when his elderly father goes AWOL, he is forced to make a detour on a Lewis and Clark historical reenactment trek, which prompts a family journey of discovery and connection. Stars Lewis Birch and Madeleine Martin

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the rise, fall and burial of the Atari Corporation told through the lens of the filmmakers unearthing hundred of thousands of unsold "E.T." game cartridges that were buried in a small town of New Mexico

programme.title: Return to Nim's Island
programme.desc: In this sequel, Nim, the precocious daughter of a scientist, still has her gift of being one with nature but now that developers and poachers threaten her island, she and her father must fight to preserve their pristine home and its abundant wildlife. Stars Bindi Irwin and John Waters

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.

programme.title: Houseguest
programme.desc: Under the hot pursuit of loan sharks, with nowhere to run and nowhere to hide, Kevin Franklin (Sinbad) stumbles directly into the break of a lifetime: a friendly family man (Phil Hartman) who thinks that Kevin's an old childhood buddy. Guess who's coming to dinner? Jeffrey Jones, Kim Greist, Stan Shaw, Tony Longo, Mason Adams and Ron Glass costar in this zany domestic comedy

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Funnyman Andy Samberg stars in his first feature, a zany farce about a development-arrested youth who believes that stunt work is in his blood - despite his many failed, highly hazardous attempts at record-setting on his scooter to the contrary. Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy

programme.desc: An intimate documentary about the explosive story of cyclist Lance Armstrong, revealing a portrait of a man who will stop at nothing in the pursuit of money, fame and success. Features candid interviews with his friends and enemies to reveal the truth behind the greatest fraud in sporting history
