programme.title: The Prisoner Of Zenda, Inc.
programme.desc: A fourteen-year-old heir (Jonathan Jackson) to dad's corporation faces the wrath of his power-mad uncle (William Shatner), who plots his nephew's overthrow. Don S. Davis costars in this humorous saga loosely based on Anthony Hope's novel

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: A musician is left reeling after her boyfriend strays but her life takes a turn when a disgraced record-label exec stumbles upon her performing in the East Village, and a chance encounter leads to a wondrous mutual transformation, set to the soundtrack of summer in New York City. Stars Keira Knightley and Mark Ruffalo

programme.title: Lovesick
programme.desc: Matt LeBlanc stars in this comic tale as a man who has everything going for him, except love - which sends him clinically insane the moment he falls for someone. With the help of his friends and his wacky neighbor, he must find a way to overcome his psychosis to claim his chance at true love. Also stars Chevy Chase

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Da Sweet Blood of Jesus
programme.desc: In this stylized Spike Lee thriller, a man cursed by a mysterious ancient African artifact is overwhelmed by a newfound thirst for blood, which leads him into a dangerous romance that calls into question the very nature of love, addiction, sex and status

programme.title: The Disappearance of Alice Creed
programme.desc: When a pair of ex-cons kidnaps a wealthy young woman, they don't anticipate that their victim will be smarter than they are and begin playing them against each other. Eddie Marsan, Martin Compston and Gemma Arterton star in this British crime thriller

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren

programme.title: Bella
programme.desc: An international soccer star is on his way to sign a multimillion-dollar contract when a series of events unfold that bring his career to an abrupt end, and when his life intersects with a waitress struggling to make it in New York, both of their lives change irrevocably, turning one ordinary day into an unforgettable experience

programme.title: That Gal...Who was in That Thing: That Guy 2
programme.desc: Documentary following eight actresses as they detail their experiences in Hollywood and wrestle with plastic surgery, race, sexism, nudity, recognition, double standards, age and family

programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: Colin Firth and Nicole Kidman star in this drama about a former British Army officer, who was tormented as a prisoner of war at a Japanese labor camp during World War II, and sets out many years later to confront the man responsible

programme.title: Clouds of Sils Maria
programme.desc: At the peak of her international career, film star Maria Enders (Juliette Binoche) comes face-to-face with an uncomfortable reflection of herself while starring in a revival of the play that made her famous twenty years ago. Co-starring Kristen Stewart and Chloë Grace Moretz

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: That Gal...Who was in That Thing: That Guy 2
programme.desc: Documentary following eight actresses as they detail their experiences in Hollywood and wrestle with plastic surgery, race, sexism, nudity, recognition, double standards, age and family

programme.title: Tiny Furniture
programme.desc: Lena Dunham directs and stars as a young woman who returns home after college to her mother's New York apartment and careens through life looking for work, romantic possibilities and meaning, in all the wrong places

programme.title: Ask Me Anything
programme.desc: A beautiful and lost young woman takes a year off before college to find herself, and chronicles her life in an anonymous blog, but as she becomes embroiled further in a series of sexual and romantic misadventures, her fearless narrative begins to crack

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: The Best Man
programme.desc: A group of successful college friends reunite for a wedding, but when one of the bridesmaids gets her hands on the best man's steamy new novel about to hit bookstores, a series of scandals about the friends are revealed that wreak havoc on their relationships. Stars Taye Diggs and Nia Long

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: Comedy based on the true story of a women's group in a small English town who choose to upend the traditional order by posing nude for their annual charity calendar. Stars Helen Mirren and Julie Walters

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Sixty years after fleeing Vienna, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) attempts to reclaim family possessions that were seized by the Nazis. Among them is a famous portrait of her beloved aunt, painted by Gustav Klimt. With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family

programme.title: Cinema Paradiso
programme.desc: This tender, Oscar(R) winning saga is a critical and commercial triumph that chronicles a boy's wondrous childhood in a small Sicilian village. It's a time spent largely in Cinema Paradiso, the local bijou where Alfredo the projectionist (Philippe Noiret) uses movies to broaden the boy's horizons and make him hungry for the world outside their village. This splendid saga stars Jacques Perrin, Salvatore Cascio, Roberta Lena and Mario Leonardi

programme.title: Miles To Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Short documentary chronicling the true story of famed musicians and the relationships they have with their roadies. Features music legends Chad Smith (Red Hot Chili Peppers), Chris Shiflett (Foo Fighters) and Jim James (My Morning Jacket), who speak candidly about their time on the road and the importance of the crew who work tirelessly to put the show together, as well as capturing a day behind-the-scenes with the crew of Pearl Jam

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: A closeted gay teen wants to join the popular girls' clique, but his scheme backfires when his best friend is forced out of the closet instead. Stars Megan Mullally and Natasha Lyonne

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: A group of gay activists work to support the miners of a tiny Welsh village during their lengthy strike in the summer of 1984. Inspired by an extraordinary true story

programme.title: Bernie

programme.title: Dirty Weekend

programme.title: The Hand That Rocks The Cradle
programme.desc: A live-in nanny (Rebecca De Mornay) with a frightening hidden agenda becomes trouble for her employers (Annabella Sciorra and Matt McCoy) when a seething vendetta explodes into homicidal rage in this well-crafted thriller, a box office smash

programme.title: Jersey Girl

Rebecca Romijn, Bai Ling and John Cleese costar in this comedy-drama from writer/director Mike Binder ("Reign Over Me")

programme.sub-title: The Last Flight of the Dixie Damsel

programme.desc: An Explosive Murder. A terrorist bombing ignites an undercover investigation involving an ambitious cop

programme.title: Raising Hope
programme.sub-title: The One Where They Get High

programme.title: Raising Hope
programme.desc: Baby Phat. Burt and Virginia's vacation at a resort recommended by Barney doesn't meet their expectations; Jimmy and Sabrina think about giving Hope a sibling

programme.title: Raising Hope
programme.desc: Dinner With Tropes. Virginia's boss has big plans for her becoming a regional sales manager, but Virginia isn't sure she wants all the added responsibility. Meanwhile, Jimmy and Sabrina worry about Hope when her pet fish's death has no effect on her; and Burt and Virginia perform at the Natesville Telethon

programme.title: Raising Hope
programme.desc: Para-Natesville Activity. Virginia sees a ghost in the house after ceasing to believe in all things magical, but when Burt finds out who the specter really is, he encourages her to put her faith in the paranormal again

programme.title: Life of Pi
programme.desc: A zookeeper's son is stranded at sea aboard a lifeboat with a zebra, an orangutan, a hyena and a Bengal tiger named Richard Parker

programme.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
programme.desc: Ben Stiller directs and stars as a daydreamer who leaves his office behind for a globetrotting life of adventure

programme.title: That's My Boy
programme.desc: Fortysomething loser Donny Berger owes thousands of dollars in taxes and his only chance to avoid jail is to talk his way back into the life of his exasperated estranged son. Comedy

programme.title: This Is the End
programme.desc: When the apocalypse hits, James Franco and his famous friends face a fight for survival. Comedy with Seth Rogen and Jonah Hill. Strong language/drugs/sexual references

programme.title: Easy A
programme.desc: Nathaniel Hawthorne's The Scarlet Letter is re-imagined as a contemporary high school comedy in this tale of a scheming student who plots to give her popularity a boost by painting herself the easiest lay in school. Like most high school kids, Olive Penderghast (Emma Stone) just wants to be popular. So much so than when her best friend, Rhiannon (Aly Michalka), asks Olive how her weekend went, the bored teen decides to whip up a spicy white lie just to make things interesting. But that minor exaggeration begins to take on a life of its own when it reaches the ears of motor-mouth gossip Jesus freak Marianne (Amanda Bynes), and in no time the entire student body is abuzz over unassuming Olive's unrepentant weekend of debauchery. Of course not a word of it is true, but that doesn't stop everyone in school from talking, and an amused Olive from deciding to go with the flow. Playing the role of the hussy to the hilt, the girl who used to be invisible begins dressing provocatively and turning heads in the hallways. The students aren't the only ones taking notice, either; Olive's English teacher, Mr. Griffith (Thomas Haden Church), is concerned that the kind of attention she's receiving isn't healthy for a developing girl, and his wife (Lisa Kudrow), the school guidance counselor, is in full agreement. The only people who seem remotely interested in the truth are Olive's trusting and open-minded parents (Stanley Tucci and Patricia Clarkson). As Olive takes note of the parallels between her own situation and the plight of the Scarlet Letter heroine Hester Prynne, she realizes that she may be able to manipulate her newfound notoriety to give fellow classmate Brandon's (Dan Byrd) popularity a much-needed shot in the arm. Olive never thought her little game could possibly have any negative effect on anyone but herself, but when loose lips start sinking ships all around her, she realizes that it's high time for the truth to come out

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton

programme.title: The Sunset Limited
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones and Samuel L Jackson star as two very different men brought together by desperate circumstances. Searing drama based on the play by Cormac McCarthy

programme.title: Toxic Hot Seat
programme.desc: Activists battle the money and political power behind the production of flame retardants that are used in homes, furniture and clothing

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, the film follows the heroism of Captain Alexei Vostrikov who, at the height of the Cold War, is ordered to take command of the nuclear missile submarine K-19 away from its original commander Captain Mikhail Polenin. Vostrikov's mission is to quickly ready the ill-prepared sub for her maiden voyage - no matter what the cost. But Vostrikov, Polenin and K-19's loyal crew can never imagine all that is expected of them. Neither can they fathom what the price of failure might be for them and for the world when a nuclear reactor malfunctions, threatening a core meltdown and an explosion that will certainly kill all aboard. As they glide beneath the Arctic seas, it is the crew's collective bravery and Vostrikov's daring embrace of his duty toward his country and his men which will ultimately save K-19... and stave off what surely would have been a nuclear disaster

programme.title: Any Given Wednesday With Bill Simmons

programme.desc: A series of massive spaceships approach Earth, which many greet with open arms, looking forward to the first contact with alien life. Unfortunately, these extraterrestrials have not come in peace, and they unleash powerful weapons that destroy most of the world's major cities. Thrown into chaos, the survivors struggle to band together and put up a last-ditch resistance in order to save the human race

programme.title: We Are Your Friends
programme.desc: We Are Your Friends is a romantic drama based around one young DJ's dreams to make it big in the electronic dance music genre. Cole (Zac Efron), who dreams about becoming a big player in the music industry, meets James (Wes Bentley), a more established disc jockey who takes him under his wing. After some time, Cole begins to develop feelings for Sophie (Emily Ratajkowski), who is dating James. Eventually, Cole must make some hard choices about his career as he moves close to Sophie, causing a fracture in the relationship between James and himself. The film co-stars Jon Bernthal (The Walking Dead), and is the first film directed by Max Joseph

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Elidee. Vernon's advised to keep mum about how he got injured; Spencer and Joe clash over the handling of a client as they fend off Andre's threats; Charles isn't sure he's ready for a new challenge; Ricky thinks about relocating

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: Shooting a war film, a group of pampered Hollywood actors suddenly find themselves in the middle of a real conflict

programme.title: Dr. Dolittle 2
programme.desc: Comedy sequel starring Eddie Murphy as the doctor who talks to animals. This time, he's helping a group of creatures save their endangered Pacific forest from the lumber industry by introducing a protected species of bear back into the wild. If his plan is to be successful, he must play Cupid to Archie and Ava, a wise-cracking, junk-food-loving circus bear smitten by a fastidious female

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: In this live-action remake of the Disney animated favorite 101 Dalmatians, six time Academy Award-nominated actress Glenn Close plays infamous Cruella De Vil, an intense fashion maven whose lust for fur doubtless places her high on PETA's hit list. Cruella is the boss of kind fashion designer Anita, who, inspired by her Dalmatians, starts working up a design for a coat made with spotted fur. Cruella likes so much the idea that decides to make the garment out of real Dalmatians. But where to get the animals? Well, Cruella has two nasty but not especially intelligent henchmen, who've been known to kill the odd endangered species at her request

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: The Good Sport. Elmo learns how to win gracefully and lose graciously while playing hot potato with Abby

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Afraid of the Bark. Elmo, Gina, Bob and Barkley help Zoe conquer her fear of dogs

programme.title: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman has a ball as the eccentric centuries-old proprietor of a magical toy store who preps his shy and insecure assistant (Natalie Portman, winsomely winning as the babe in Toyland) to take over the business in this fantastic fantasy. A zany, brainy delight from first-time director Zach Helm, who wrote the screenplay. Jason Bateman costars as a stuffy accountant who comes to understanding the wonders of the place

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel to Madagascar continuing the adventures of the animals from a New York zoo who have become trapped on the African island. While attempting to fly a plane back to New York, the animals crash land in mainland Africa, where they are amazed to be reunited with more of their own kind and, in some cases, their actual families. Unfortunately, life in Africa is not what it at first seems, with Alex soon falling foul of lion etiquette and the humans causing problems for all of the wild animals of the Savannah

programme.title: The Comebacks
programme.desc: Lambeau Fields is a football coach who suffers from a streak of bad luck that has become the stuff of legend. As a last resort, he takes a job coaching a college football team populated with some of the least desirable players imaginable. He must pull this ragtag crew together in order to salvage his career

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: An elderly couple in Nepal blinded by cataracts are given the opportunity to see again thanks to a simple surgery, but first they must be convinced to take the long journey to a clinic

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: A gripping drama based on the true story of the mission to rescue 33 miners who were trapped in a underground mine for 69 days

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: An irritable ogre accepts a mission to save a princess on the condition that his home will be left free of fairytale characters

programme.title: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: Charlie Brown, Snoopy, Woodstock and friends embark on an epic adventure in this charming adaptation of the beloved comic strip

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalise Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results

programme.title: World Championship Boxing
programme.desc: Andre Ward (29-0, 15 KOs) faces Alexander Brand (25-1, 19 KOs) in a light-heavyweight bout in Oakland. Ward defeated Sullivan Barrera in March

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: A special episode offering a comprehensive portrait of the International Olympic Committee, its impact on international competition and its power and influence. Also: a look at the IOC's role in the turmoil surrounding the games in Rio

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Elidee. Vernon's advised to keep mum about how he got injured; Spencer and Joe clash over the handling of a client as they fend off Andre's threats; Charles isn't sure he's ready for a new challenge; Ricky thinks about relocating

programme.title: Looking: The Movie
programme.desc: Patrick returns to San Francisco after spending nearly a year in Denver, but while he's in town for a wedding, he also must confront some unresolved relationships he left in his rearview mirror

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin (Ice Cube) never wanted to take over the family business, a barbershop on the south side of Chicago. Disgusted with the shop's crime-ridden neighborhood, and caught up in his moneymaking schemes, one morning Calvin decides to sell the shop to the shady Lester (Keith David). Chastised by his pregnant wife, Jennifer (Jazsmin Lewis), for his rash decision, Calvin spends the day cutting heads at the shop, and starts to understand the importance of the legacy his grandfather and father have left to him. The bickering barbers include Eddie (Cedric the Entertainer), the old-timer with his own unique perspective on black life; Terri (rapper Eve in her film debut), a hot-tempered woman with a trifling boyfriend; Jimmy (Sean Patrick Thomas), a college educated snob; Ricky (Michael Ealy) a reformed criminal; Isaac (Troy Garity, the son of Jane Fonda and Tom Hayden), a white B-Boy, whom no one is ready to let cut their hair; and Dinka (Leonard Howze), a recent African immigrant who's too shy to express his feelings for Terri. Calvin learns to appreciate them all, and discovers that the place where they work is more than just a place to get a haircut -- it's a meeting place for the neighborhood, a place where folks can speak their minds and find out what's happening. Calvin gradually changes his mind about selling the shop, but it may be too late. Meanwhile, a bumbling thief, J.D. (Anthony Anderson) spends a painful day trying to crack open the ATM he's stolen from the grocery store across the street. Barbershop was directed by Tim Story and produced by George Tillman Jr. and Robert Teitel, the producers of Soul Food. Barbershop had its world premiere at the 2002 Urbanworld Film Festival

programme.title: Standing Still
programme.desc: A popular yet drunken actor reconnects with a group of his college friends for a wedding several years after graduation

programme.title: Cry-Baby
programme.desc: It's the 1950s gang scene where face is everything and mixing with the uncool is frowned upon. When Allison from the Squares falls for Cry-Baby Walker of the Drapes all social barriers fall away as they fight the system to be together

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Conservative Welton Academy is enlivened by the arrival of a charismatic English teacher who inspires his students with unconventional methods and philosophies

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global super stardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds in this spirited adapted musical fantasy

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: In this high-octane thrill ride, a helicopter pilot races to rescue his daughter and estranged wife as a series of massive earthquakes devastate California. Meanwhile, a Cal Tech professor attempts to warn other citizens

programme.title: Remember the Titans
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of a football coach who must overcome hostility from colleagues and players alike in order to lead his racially integrated team to glory. When three 1971 Virginian high schools merge, the already tense relationships are exaggerated by the appointment of an African-American head coach as the team becomes the symbol for the divided community

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: In this sci-fi epic in which human beings are the least-evolved species in the known universe, an ex-soldier protects a seemingly ordinary woman who's been targeted for assassination by a ruthless queen

programme.desc: Jason Bourne searches for his own identity after a bout of amnesia, leading him on a globe-trekking trip in which he must avoid the zinging bullets of cops and assassins who are out to stop him before he uncovers the truth

programme.title: National Lampoon's Van Wilder
programme.desc: Irreverent teen comedy focusing on a college undergraduate who, after being a senior student for seven years enjoying a hedonistic, fun-filled life, finds his wealthy father has cut off his allowance. He is left with no choice but to become a professional party organiser on campus. When an intrepid student reporter writes an unflattering article about him, the young man sets out to prove her wrong, falling in love with her along the way

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher

programme.title: Play It to the Bone
programme.desc: Boxing comedy drama about two ageing fighters who never made the big time but remain good friends. When an undercard bout in Las Vegas is cancelled at short notice, they are asked to step in. Unfortunately, they have to fight each other

programme.title: My Life in Ruins
programme.desc: Georgia (Nia Vardalos) came to Greece to follow a man. A few years later, she's been cast aside -- alone and adrift in a foreign land. Eventually, her passion for history leads her to a job as a tour guide. But Georgia is bored, and has lost her "kefi" (Greek for mojo) to boot. When taciturn sasquatch Poupi (Alexis Georgoulis) replaces the regular driver at the last minute, the frazzled tour guide thinks that her luck has just hit rock bottom. Thankfully, Georgia's latest batch of tourists is a more lively bunch than she's anticipated, and in between bouts with rival tour guide Nico (Alistair McGowan), she manages to form a genuine connection with wisecracking widower Irv (Richard Dreyfuss), a solo vacationer who maintains a jovial facade despite the fact that he misses his late wife dearly. With a little help from Irv, Georgia comes to realize that true love may be closer than she thinks -- if she could just recapture her kefi and open her eyes

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: WikiLeaks' Julian Assange and comedian Jeff Ross are the interview guests. The panelists are filmmaker Rob Reiner, former senator Rick Santorum and political commentator Tara Setmayer

programme.title: Vice

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Entrenched in the racial tumult of Los Angeles in the mid-1980's, a group of aspiring rappers banded together to revolutionize the global consumption of hip-hop and popular culture. NWA was born out of racial frustration and the disadvantaged economics of their South Central neighborhood. F. Gary Gray directs this biopic about the rise to stardom for the act that earned the moniker of "The World's Most Dangerous Group", featuring Ice Cube's son O'Shea Jackson Jr. playing the role of his father, Corey Hawkins as Dr. Dre, and Jason Mitchell as the late Eazy-E

programme.title: I Think I Love My Wife
programme.desc: A married man who daydreams about being with other women finds his will and morals tested after he's visited by the ex-mistress of his old friend

programme.title: Tropic Thunder
programme.desc: In this raucous action-movie spoof, actors (including Ben Stiller, Robert Downey Jr. and Jack Black) are on location in the jungle playing Vietnam War soldiers when they run afoul of real-life drug traders. Stiller co-wrote the screenplay and also directed. Nick Nolte, Tom Cruise, Matthew McConaughey, Steve Coogan

programme.title: D.C. Cab
programme.desc: In this casual, uninvolved comedy running on a low-octane script, a scruffy taxi company is about to be wiped out when its owner Harold (Max Gail) exhorts his cabbies to do what they can to help save the company -- and what they can do turns out to be a surprise to everyone concerned. Saving the day (and the film) are the likeable, eccentric drivers, introduced by means of a new trainee (Adam Baldwin) who rides around with each in turn

programme.title: My Life in Ruins
programme.desc: After losing her teaching job in Athens, American born Georgia (Nia Vardalos) takes a job as a tour guide. But the tourists, mostly Americans, are bored with history and facts all they want to do is to shop. Hopeless and lost, Georgia gets a new chance to find her mojo when she meets a solo vacationer (Richard Dreyfuss) who maintains a jovial facade despite the fact that he misses his late wife dearly. Thanks to an unlikely friendship, Georgia comes to realize that true love may be closer than she thinks

programme.title: The Dream Team
programme.desc: Mental patients fly the cuckoo's nest for a fling in the Big Apple, and are soon followed by a group of low-rent criminals

programme.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
programme.desc: A misfit teenager forms an unlikely friendship with a female classmate who has leukemia. As they grow closer, she helps him with his creative endeavours and forces him to confront the messiness of real life

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A 70-year-old widower comes out of retirement to take an internship at a trendy fashion magazine

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: Flamboyant Hollywood remake of the 1979 French farce La Cage Aux Folles. When his son's conservative future in-laws come to town, gay club owner Armand and his cross-dressing partner Albert are forced to play husband and wife

programme.title: Cheech and Chong's Next Movie
programme.desc: In an unfunny, scattered sequel to their successful Up in Smoke, Cheech Marin and Tommy Chong reprise their roles as carefree men who do inhale. But this time around Cheech is out of a job and trying to dodge his bilious neighbor while chasing the lovely Donna (Evelyn Guerrero) with anything but honorable intentions. Meanwhile, Cheech's cousin Red (also Cheech Marin) and Chong go tooling around Hollywood in a luxury sports car looking for adventure

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: A female political consultant is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival, who is working on the opponent's campaign and is looking for every opportunity to antagonise her

programme.title: State and Main
programme.desc: Acclaimed playwright David Mamet wrote and directed this wickedly funny satire about a quaint New England town that's invaded by an obnoxious film crew. Alec Baldwin stars as a vacuous leading man whose "hobby"---underage local girls---is only one of the problems facing the producer and director. The expert ensemble cast also includes William H. Macy, Julia Stiles, Charles Durning, Philip Seymour Hoffman and Sarah Jessica Parker

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A 70-year-old widower comes out of retirement to take an internship at a trendy fashion magazine

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: Flamboyant Hollywood remake of the 1979 French farce La Cage Aux Folles. When his son's conservative future in-laws come to town, gay club owner Armand and his cross-dressing partner Albert are forced to play husband and wife

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: A large diamond becomes the common denominator for an interlocking network of lowlifes, thugs, gangsters and a bare-knuckle boxing champ

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: Mel Brooks' classic sci-fi parody, starring Mel himself, Bill Pullman, Rick Moranis, John Candy and Joan Rivers. Packed full of more hilarious in-jokes than you can shake a lightsabre at

programme.title: HBO Comedy Half-Hour
programme.desc: Dave Chappelle. Dave Chappelle performs a stand-up routine. Topics include ignorant cops; black stereotypes; and black leaders. Taped in San Francisco

programme.title: Forget Paris
programme.desc: An NBA ref falls for an airline exec while in Paris to bury his father. After a week of love and laughs, the couple marry and return to the States. Their relationship quickly sours, however, as they struggle with living together, conflicting schedules and long separations

programme.title: Making of 'Pitch Perfect 2'
programme.desc: A look at "Pitch Perfect 2," a 2015 musical comedy about a collegiate a cappella group that enters an international competition no U.S. team has ever won. The sequel to the 2012 film stars Anna Kendrick, Skylar Astin and Rebel Wilson, and is directed by Elizabeth Banks

programme.title: Cry-Baby
programme.desc: John Waters does a quirky spin on '50s nostalgia in Cry-Baby, his musical homage to Rebel Without a Cause and +Romeo and Juliet. Set in Baltimore in 1954 at the birth of rock & roll, the film features Johnny Depp as Wade "Cry-Baby" Walker. Depp is pure charisma as a juvenile delinquent with a permanent tear slithering down his cheek, a reminder of his state-executed parents. In the depths of his despair appears goody-goody girl Allison (Amy Locane), who has a sexual crush on Cry-Baby. But Allison's Pat Boone-like boyfriend, Baldwin (Stephen E. Miller), the leader of the squares, is dead set against Cry-Baby and the rest of the juvenile delinquents and leads a revolt against them. In the resultant riot, the juvenile delinquents are blamed for the chaos, and Cry-Baby finds himself dispatched to reform school

programme.title: Connie and Carla
programme.desc: Nia Vardalos ("My Big Fat Greek Wedding") wrote and stars in this cheery musical farce. She and Toni Collette play two struggling Chicago singers who pose as drag performers in L.A. after they witness a mob hit in Chicago. David Duchovny, Stephen Spinella, Alec Mapa

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: The Barden Bellas are back, determined to enter (and win) an international competition. After a disasterous performance elsewhere, the Bellas have much more to prove if they want to become the best

programme.title: Georgia Rule
programme.desc: Powerhouse performances by Jane Fonda, Felicity Huffman and Lindsay Lohan spark this touching and bittersweet saga of three generations of family members dealing with past and present problems, including rape, addictions and promiscuity. Directed by Garry Marshall

programme.title: HBO Comedy Half-Hour
programme.desc: Margaret Cho. Margaret Cho makes observations on dieting, racism and her sitcom "All American Girl." Taped at the Variety Arts Theater in Los Angeles

programme.title: Keeping the Faith
programme.desc: Two pals grow up with the same vocation; one becomes a rabbi, the other a Catholic priest. But their faith and friendship are tested when old schoolfriend Anna Reilly shows up in town. Comedy

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, an intelligent but self-conscious deskbound CIA analyst (Melissa McCarthy) is finally given the chance to go undercover as a homely "cat lady" in order to save her missing partner (Jude Law) and thwart a global disaster at the hands of a dangerous arms dealer. Written and directed by Paul Feig

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: Movie star Vincent Chase makes his directorial debut, but runs into trouble when he goes over budget. Meanwhile, E prepares for the birth of his child, Johnny Drama seeks a breakout role and Turtle tries to woo MMA fighter Ronda Rousey. Based on the HBO series

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: The Barden Bellas are back, determined to enter (and win) an international competition. After a disasterous performance elsewhere, the Bellas have much more to prove if they want to become the best

programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: Anne Fletcher's rom-com stars Katherine Heigl as Jane, an amateur wedding planner for her friends, who hopes to be the blushing bride herself (eventually) to her advertising executive boss George. Her ambition is dashed when her fun-loving gorgeous sister Tess appears on the scene and sweeps him off his feet, leaving Jane to plan yet another wedding. But maybe there's hope for her in the shape of Kevin, a journalist who is intrigued by Jane's perpetual bridesmaid role and wants to write a story about her, if only they didn't mix like oil and water... Edited for language

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, an intelligent but self-conscious deskbound CIA analyst (Melissa McCarthy) is finally given the chance to go undercover as a homely "cat lady" in order to save her missing partner (Jude Law) and thwart a global disaster at the hands of a dangerous arms dealer. Written and directed by Paul Feig

programme.title: The Secret of the Magic Gourd
programme.desc: Wonderful blend of live action and CGI animation telling the amazing coming-of-age tale of a lazy young boy (Zhu Oi Long) who discovers an enchanted fruit that has the power to grant wishes and give him anything his heart desires. But soon the magic gourd begins to drive the lad out of his gourd. Gigi Leung, Peisi Chen. Directed by John Chu and Frankie Chung, and written by Chu and Lam Kee To, who adapted the popular 1958 kids' book by Zhang Tianyi

programme.title: Project X
programme.desc: A grounded pilot discovers a secret government experiment that involves exposing a group of trained chimpanzees to obscenely high levels of radiation. This comedy-drama follows the pilot as he teams together with a kind-hearted researcher to free the animals, even though it might mean the end of his career

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: A mischievous 8-year-old is accidentally left behind in a frenzied rush to the airport for a family holiday in Paris. After learning to fend for himself, the boy has to protect his house against two bumbling burglars who are planning to rob it

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: Robinita Hood. "Robinita Hood" is a Hispanic version of the tale of an outlaw (voice of Rosie Perez) and her Merry Chicas, who rob from the rich to give to the poor. Other voices include Marc Anthony, Rick Najera, Idalis de Leon, Nestor Carbonell, Nancy Garcia, Ian Gomez, Daphne Rubin-Vega

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel to Madagascar continuing the adventures of the animals from a New York zoo who have become trapped on the African island. While attempting to fly a plane back to New York, the animals crash land in mainland Africa, where they are amazed to be reunited with more of their own kind and, in some cases, their actual families. Unfortunately, life in Africa is not what it at first seems, with Alex soon falling foul of lion etiquette and the humans causing problems for all of the wild animals of the Savannah

programme.desc: An embittered CIA agent plus an evil scientist means bad news for pint-sized spy Cody. Their plot jeopardises a meeting of the world's leaders in London. Cody must act as a musical prodigy to find out more, but playing the clarinet is sometimes harder than spying

programme.title: The Iron Giant
programme.desc: Based on Ted Hughes' book, Brad Bird's animation opens in 1957 in Maine, with the landing of the Iron Giant. Snacking his way through a village on TV antennas and cars, he finds a power plant which promises a more substantial meal. Which is where young Hogarth Hughes (voiced by Eli Marienthal) finds him and saves him from electrocution. Now all he has to do is hide him from his mother Annie (Jenifer Aniston) and the authorities who, with the Cold War at its height, determine that the Iron Giant is a threat which must be destroyed all costs

programme.desc: Kids of all ages will jockey for position in front of the TV for this heartwarming and funny family comedy about an abandoned zebra (voice of Frankie Muniz) that yearns to be a Thoroughbred after it is adopted by a Kentucky farm girl (Hayden Panettiere). programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: Brilliant scientist Reed Richards builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past. This reboot of the iconic Marvel superhero team stars Miles Teller as Richards (who becomes Mr. Fantastic, able to bend and stretch his body into impossible shapes), Michael B. Jordan as Johnny Storm (aka the Human Torch, whose body can erupt in flames), Kate Mara as Sue Storm (aka the Invisible Woman -- no explanation needed), and Jamie Bell as Ben Grimm (who is transformed into the rock monster known as The Thing). Directed by Josh Trank, who previously worked with Jordan on the superhero film Chronicle

programme.title: Broad Street Bullies
programme.desc: Documentary on the Philadelphia Flyers of the 1970s and the aggressive style of play that won them back-to-back Stanley Cups. Beloved in their home city and despised elsewhere, the Flyers were one of the most polarizing champions in sports. Among those interviewed are Bobby Clarke; Bill Barber; Dave Schultz; Bill Clement; and Gary Dornhoefer

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan boy discovers his destiny as Peter Pan, and is whisked away to an enchanted land to battle the fearsome pirate Blackbeard with the help of the warrior woman Tiger Lily

programme.title: The Last Mimzy
programme.desc: Two children discover a mysterious black box on a beach and develop special powers. They learn that the box contains a message from the future asking for help. But with the FBI closing in, do they have time?

programme.title: Don't Divorce Me! Kids' Rules for Parents on Divorce
programme.desc: Children talk about divorce and offer advice for parents to make sure kids are not manipulated, forgotten or mistreated when the time for permanent separation comes

programme.title: I Have Tourette's but Tourette's Doesn't Have Me
programme.desc: A look at children coping with Tourette Syndrome as they face the challenges of their condition and ridicule from their peers. Produced and directed by Ellen Goosenberg Kent

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: Children's classic about an orphan who brings about a remarkable change in the life of her uncle's sombre mansion. Mary is sent to live with her uncle after the death of her parents, but his manner leaves her feeling bitterly alone. Then she discovers a young crippled boy whom she adopts as a playmate, and together they dare to explore a forbidden walled garden. Based on the novel by Frances Hodgson Burnett

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: The Friendly Ghost attempts to befriend the 12-year-old daughter of a paranormal expert, but his nasty ghost uncles wreak havoc

programme.title: Pan
programme.desc: An orphan boy discovers his destiny as Peter Pan, and is whisked away to an enchanted land to battle the fearsome pirate Blackbeard with the help of the warrior woman Tiger Lily

programme.title: The Secret of the Magic Gourd
programme.desc: Wonderful blend of live action and CGI animation telling the amazing coming-of-age tale of a lazy young boy (Zhu Oi Long) who discovers an enchanted fruit that has the power to grant wishes and give him anything his heart desires. But soon the magic gourd begins to drive the lad out of his gourd. Gigi Leung, Peisi Chen. Directed by John Chu and Frankie Chung, and written by Chu and Lam Kee To, who adapted the popular 1958 kids' book by Zhang Tianyi

programme.title: Max
programme.desc: A military dog from Afghanistan is adopted by his late handler's grieving family in the U.S., where his close bond with the soldier's brother leads to a life-altering revelation in this family-friendly adventure from MGM and director Boaz Yakin (who penned the screenplay alongside writer Sheldon Lettich)

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a "60 Minutes" expose on Big Tobacco

programme.title: Jet Li's Fearless
programme.desc: Martial arts action based on the true story of the legendary Chinese hero Huo Yuan Jia, who seeks to rebuild his reputation after an error of judgment leads to his master's death. He learns that sportsmanship rather than brutality is the key to being a successful fighter

programme.title: Stargate: Continuum
programme.desc: In a feature-length SG-1 special, Ba'al travels back in time and erases the Stargate programme from history. Can the team put the timeline back on track?

programme.title: The Mistress of Spices
programme.desc: The life of Indian woman Tilo has been a real rollercoaster ride. She's been kidnapped by bandits, escaped from them, and has been trained in the noble art of using spices. Across the globe, in San Francisco, she opens her own store of spices and teaches her customers about the magical characteristics of spices. She follows three strict rules: to please her customers, but never get satisfied herself, to never leave the store and never let anyone touch her skin. But, when the charming architect Doug stops by her shop, all of the rules are suddenly hard to follow..

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: With the help of his best friend John, a sentient teddy bear named Ted fights to be legally recognized as a human so he can have a child with his new wife Tami-Lynn. This gut-busting comedy is a sequel to the 2012 surprise hit

programme.title: Love & Basketball
programme.desc: Gina Prince-Bythewood wrote and directed this winning romantic drama about two young basketball stars. Omar Epps plays the cocky son of an NBA player; Sanaa Lathan is his tomboy girlfriend. Their relationship doesn't always go smoothly and, over the span of 15 years, they rebound from a number of romantic crises. Dennis Haysbert, Alfre Woodard

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: A gripping drama based on the true story of the mission to rescue 33 miners who were trapped in a underground mine for 69 days

programme.title: Mafia!
programme.desc: Young Vincenzo Cortino, son of a Sicilian postman, travels to America to later become the clumsy chief of organized crime with his sons -- short-fused Joey and educated Anthony. One day, Tony makes a mistake and has to leave town. But when assassins try to do away with his father, he sets out for revenge

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: In a sun-parched future, loner Max gets caught up in the exodus of a clan of rebels fleeing an evil despot as they race across the Wasteland

programme.title: Trespass
programme.desc: Two Arkansas firemen learn from a dying man that he hid a stash of gold in a disused warehouse 50 years earlier in an East St Louis ghetto. When they go in search of the loot, the pair unwittingly observe a murder carried out by the local mob and become targets themselves, especially when it becomes known why they happen to be in the area in the first place

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: With the help of his best friend John, a sentient teddy bear named Ted fights to be legally recognized as a human so he can have a child with his new wife Tami-Lynn. This gut-busting comedy is a sequel to the 2012 surprise hit

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: In Terry Gilliam's inventive fantasy, the famed authors are cast as con artists who get caught up in a real-life fairy tale involving a haunted forest where girls have been disappearing. Matt Damon and Heath Ledger star in this whimsical adventure. Jonathan Pryce, Monica Bellucci, Peter Stormare, Lena Headey

programme.title: Bikini Model Mayhem
programme.desc: A scheming politician programs bikini-clad robots to seduce his opponents so he can blackmail them

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: One year after a humiliating viral video drove a teen to commit suicide, her high-school classmates are terrorized by an anonymous online presence seeking revenge

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: A legendary monster hunter battles Count Dracula, Frankenstein's creature and the Wolf Man

programme.title: Dirty Driving: Thundercars of Indiana
programme.desc: Documentarian Jon Alpert visits Anderson, Ind., where residents who are still reeling from the closing of a once-thriving General Motors factory seek distraction from a struggling economy in auto racing at the local speedway on Friday nights

programme.title: The Namesake
programme.desc: A Bengali family tries to acclimate to life in the U.S. in this poignant and bittersweet saga of cultures clashing across generations. Their teenage son (Kal Penn) does not embrace their Indian heritage until he visits Calcutta, where he gains an understanding of the importance of his family's past. Indian-born Mira Nair directed from a script by Sooni Taraporevala, who adapted Pulitzer Prize-winner Jhumpa Lahiri's novel. Bollywood superstar Tabu costars as Penn's old-world mother

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding installment in the dystopian young-adult series, Thomas and the other Gladers journey across an obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the organization known as WCKD

programme.title: Alpha Dog
programme.desc: This gritty, highly intense fact-based crime drama tells the sordid tale of a group of drug dealers who kidnap the teenage brother (Anton Yelchin) of a client (Ben Foster) who owes them money and refuses to pay. At first the hostage is treated like their guest, but soon things spiral out of control and a pivotal decision about his fate must be reached. The outstanding young cast is led by Justin Timberlake, Emile Hirsch and Shawn Hatosy. Bruce Willis and Sharon Stone are also featured

programme.title: 28 Weeks Later
programme.desc: The US army flies in to reboot a destroyed London, but those still infected with the Rage Virus have other plans. Strong language/strong bloody violence/flashing images. (2007)(96 mins)

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: Neglected by her adulterous husband and left feeling particularly vulnerable as her marriage crumbles, lonely teacher Claire (Jennifer Lopez) has an affair with a younger neighbor (Ryan Guzman) that turns terrifying as his fiery lust morphs into dangerous obsession. John Corbett, Ian Nelson, and Kristin Chenoweth co-star

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: The Field Trip. Danny wants to impress Amanda on a field trip organized by history teacher Mr. Hayden

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A raunchy yet heartfelt comedy from director Judd Apatow about Amy (Amy Schumer), a commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City, who must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: A former British Special Forces agent now delivers cargo, no questions asked, in the south of France, but soon finds himself mixed up in a slave-trade ring

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In this pulse-pounding installment in the dystopian young-adult series, Thomas and the other Gladers journey across an obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the organization known as WCKD

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: Neglected by her adulterous husband and left feeling particularly vulnerable as her marriage crumbles, lonely teacher Claire (Jennifer Lopez) has an affair with a younger neighbor (Ryan Guzman) that turns terrifying as his fiery lust morphs into dangerous obsession. John Corbett, Ian Nelson, and Kristin Chenoweth co-star

programme.title: Maps to the Stars
programme.desc: In this brilliant melodrama, a high-powered Hollywood family unravel after their troubled daughter returns home, years after causing a fire that nearly killed her brother. Meanwhile, the daughter develops a relationship with a limo driver, and an aging actress pines for a role that she was born to play

programme.title: La Jaula De Oro
programme.desc: A story of three teenagers who leave Guatemala to pursue a better life in the United States

programme.title: Off-Air
programme.desc: Off-Air

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Feelgood tennis romance from the makers of Notting Hill. Low-ranking British pro Peter is inspired to greatness in his last Wimbledon tournament when he starts dating American golden girl Lizzie. But while their love match spurs him on, her game falls apart..

programme.title: Eulogy
programme.desc: Writer/director Michael Clancy makes his feature film debut with the black comedy Eulogy. Zooey Deschanel plays Kate Collins, an unhappy college student who is made even more unhappy when her grandfather (Rip Torn) dies. Even though the entire family hates each other, they reunite at the home of Grandma Collins (Piper Laurie). Among other family members, Kate observes a war between her washed-up actor dad, Daniel (Hank Azaria); her lesbian Aunt Lucy (Kelly Preston); her wound-up Uncle Skip (Ray Romano); and her strict Aunt Alice (Debra Winger). Tensions escalate and family secrets are ultimately revealed. Kate is also inundated with the eulogy-writing duties, as she's the only one capable of such a task. Meanwhile, she reunites with old flame Ryan Carmichael (Jesse Bradford). Eulogy premiered at the Sundance Film Festival in 2004

programme.title: Appropriate Behavior
programme.desc: A bisexual woman from a staunchly traditional Persian family attempts to determine why her last relationship failed. Meanwhile, she stages silent acts of rebellion in response to her brother's recent engagement

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: In the next installment of the "Maze Runner" franchise Thomas (Dylan O'Brien), Teresa (Kaya Scodelario) and the rest of the Gladers search for clues about WCKD, a powerful organization in the Scorch, a bleak landscape that is filled with dangerous obstacles. The Gladers partner with resistance fighters to take on WCKD in an attempt to discover their plans for the future in this young-adult dystopian thriller from 20th Century Fox. Directed by Wes Ball who previously directed the original film, The Maze Runner. Cast includes Thomas Brodie-Sangster, Giancarlo Esposito, Aidan Gillen, Ki Hong Lee, Barry Pepper, Lili Taylor and Patricia Clarkson

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her

programme.title: Diagnosis Bipolar: Five Families Search For Answers
Furious 7
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto (Vin Diesel) and his tight-knit gang of street racers must battle the brother of a defeated nemesis and rescue a software genius from terrorists. The film is dedicated to series regular Paul Walker, who died halfway through production

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: When their old pal Reuben has a heart attack after being double-crossed by scheming businessman Willie Bank, Danny Ocean's team of gifted grifters reunite to get their own back. Thriller

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her

programme.title: A Walk Among the Tombstones
programme.desc: A heroin trafficker whose wife was abducted and murdered hires a haunted private investigator to track down the men who killed her in this brooding crime drama starring Liam Neeson. Matt Scudder (Neeson) was an NYPD cop having a quiet drink in a Washington Heights bar when a pair of armed robbers came in guns blazing. Giving chase, Scudder kills the robbers in the street, though a stray bullet turns a heroic moment tragic. Devastated, Scudder subsequently goes to work as an unlicensed private detective, working just outside of the law and surviving on generous gifts offered in exchange for his services. Now, tasked with rooting out the sadistic thugs who brutally murdered the wife of a wealthy drug dealer (Dan Stevens), Scudder scours the bars and back alleys of New York City in search of his elusive targets -- and the closer he gets, the more apparent it becomes that they are something much more sinister than your typical kidnappers

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: Tight-knit gang of street racers battle a new nemesis and rescue a software genius from terrorists

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: Edward Norton is sensational in director Spike Lee's riveting drama about a drug dealer and his last night of freedom before prison. The film is also a poignant salute to the resilience of New York City in the aftermath of Sept. 11. The strong supporting cast includes Barry Pepper, Rosario Dawson, Philip Seymour Hoffman and ex-football star Tony Siragusa

programme.title: State of Play
programme.desc: A look at the challenges of balancing professional success in sports and family obligations, focusing on three couples on the field and at home—Mike and Kiya Tomlin; Kevin and DeLana Harvick; and Scott and Megan Lenhoff

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: A black yuppie rethinks life on the corporate fast-track after he falls in love with an ultra-hip club promoter. Knowing that she finds him a total square, he seeks the advice of a cool young mail clerk on how to approach her

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: A special episode offering a comprehensive portrait of the International Olympic Committee, its impact on international competition and its power and influence. Also: a look at the IOC's role in the turmoil surrounding the games in Rio

programme.title: Frankie and Johnny
programme.desc: Dowdy diner waitress Frankie is courted by short-order cook Johnny, who is determined to win her over by any means necessary

programme.title: Phil Spector
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as legendary music producer Phil Spector in this compelling film exploring Spector's relationship with his attorney (Helen Mirren) during his first trial for murder

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: Powerful crime drama about a petty criminal who is released after five years in prison when his corrupt lawyer exploits a legal technicality. Carlito is determined to go straight, but he agrees to take part in a lucrative shady business deal at his attorney's instigation - figuring to discharge the debt of gratitude he owes. Despite his intentions, he finds himself relentlessly drawn back into the world he sought to escape

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon
programme.desc: A bank robbery in Brooklyn goes wrong and evolves into a protracted hostage situation, turning the plan's mastermind into a media celebrity and the event into a media circus. Based on a true story

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as Tony Montana, an exiled Cuban criminal who goes to work for Miami drug lord Robert Loggia. Montana rises to the top of Florida's crime chain, appropriating Loggia's cokehead mistress (Michelle Pfeiffer) in the process. Howard Hawks' "X Marks the Spot" motif in depicting the story line's many murders is dispensed with in the 1983 Scarface; instead, we are inundated with blood by the bucketful, especially in the now-infamous buzz saw scene. One carry-over from the original Scarface is Tony Montana's incestuous yearnings for his sister Gina (Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio). The screenplay for the 1983 Scarface was written by Oliver Stone

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Driven by an extravagant, tour-de-force performance by Al Pacino, Scent of a Woman is the story of Frank Slade (Pacino), a blind, retired army colonel who hires Charlie Simms (Chris O'Donnell), a poor college student on the verge of expulsion, to take care of him over Thanksgiving weekend. At the beginning of the weekend, Frank takes Charlie to New York, where he reveals to the student that he intends to visit his family, have a few terrific meals, sleep with a beautiful woman and, finally, commit suicide. The film follows the mis-matched pair over the course of the weekend, as they learn about life through their series of adventures. Though the story is a little contrived and predictable, it pulls all the right strings, thanks to O'Donnell's sympathetic supporting role and Pacino's powerful lead performance, for which he won his first Academy Award. Scent of a Woman is based on the 1975 Italian film Profumo Di Donna

programme.title: Sea of Love
programme.desc: Jaded cop Frank trawls the lonely hearts column for clues to identify a serial killer preying on lovesick single men. Then he places his own advert, hoping to flush the killer out. Excellent crime thriller

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A con artist takes on an inexperienced apprentice, but struggles to keep his eyes on the prize when he develops romantic feelings for her

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: A graceful Amazon princess of untold strength and beauty attempts to prevent the god of war from instigating a conflict that will last for centuries and destroy the human race as the animated adventure marking the return of DC Comics heroine Wonder Woman. On the mystical island of Themyscira lives a fierce race of warrior Amazons who have raised a powerful daughter named Princess Diana. The Amazons live in secrecy from the outside world, but when Army fighter pilot Steve Travor crash-lands in their tropical paradise, the headstrong princess defies the law of the land by accompanying Trevor back to civilization. But her transition into the modern world won't be an easy one, because when Ares escapes from his Amazonian prison and begins plotting his revenge, Princess Diana is the only person who stands between the god of war, and the destruction of the human race - beginning with the Amazons. Now, as Princess Diana harnesses her unique powers to boldly fight back against Ares and save the planet from certain destruction, Wonder Woman is born and the battle for civilization begins

programme.title: Balls of Fury
programme.desc: An ex-ping pong champion is persuaded by the FBI to go undercover at an underground table tennis tournament, where he comes face-to-face with his dad's fiendishly evil murderer

programme.title: Code Name: The Cleaner
programme.desc: Cedric the Entertainer is a riot as an amnesiac who gets mixed up with secret agents, a mysterious femme fatale (Nicollette Sheridan) and a high-level conspiracy in this hilarious spy spoof. Lucy Liu, Mark Dacascos, Callum Keith Rennie. Directed by Les Mayfield

programme.title: Lucky Numbers
programme.desc: John Travolta plays Russ Richards, a small-town weatherman who is such a local celebrity that he even has his own table at the local Denny's. He obviously sees himself as a big deal about town, and he's got the spending habits to prove it, including payments on a big house and a fancy Jaguar. His unstable life is further complicated by the fling he's having with the station's lotto girl, who is also having an affair with the married station manager

programme.title: The Brothers McMullen
programme.desc: Director: Edward Burns. Three Irish Catholic brothers from Long Island struggle to deal with love, marriage, and infidelity

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: Career woman Joy heads off to Las Vegas to cheer herself up after being very publicly dumped by her boyfriend. Fate leads her to meeting amiable slacker Jack and the new friends soon enjoy a boozy evening. Later that evening, rather drunk, they end up getting hitched. As reality dawns the next morning, the duo plan to divorce as quickly as they married. But Jack wins a massive amount of money, after putting one of Joy's coins in a slot machine. Their squabble over the money leads to a judge freezing the assets and sentencing them to make a go of their marriage - for at least six months. Tom Vaughan's romantic comedy also stars Queen Latifah as the marriage guidance expert who tries to keep the couple together

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, as a diabolical homicide suspect, and Ryan Gosling as the dogged prosecutor on his tail are equally fascinating as they engage in a deadly game of cat and mouse in this absorbing legal thriller. Hopkins is a brilliant engineer who is literally trying to get away with murder---his wife's---and Gosling is the DA whose case is not as open-and-shut as he thought it would be. Directed by Gregory Hoblit

programme.title: Under Siege
programme.desc: Casey Ryback is a former Navy SEAL captain who is now the cook aboard the USS Missouri. Everyone aboard is about to celebrate the birthday of Captain Adams. They've even hired a band led by William Strannix, and former playboy playmate Jordan Tate to jump out of a cake and dance. What Adams doesn't know is that he is in for a deadly surprise

Sin City author Frank Miller's sweeping take on the historic Battle of Thermopylae comes to the screen courtesy of Dawn of the Dead director Zack Snyder. Gerard Butler stars as Spartan King Leonidas and Lena Headey plays Queen Gorgo. The massive army of the Persian Empire is sweeping across the globe, crushing every force that dares stand in its path. When a Persian envoy arrives in Sparta offering King Leonidas power over all of Greece if he will only bow to the will of the all powerful Xerxes (Rodrigo Santoro), the strong-willed leader assembles a small army comprised of his empire's best fighters and marches off to battle. Though they have virtually no hope of defeating Xerxes' intimidating battalion, Leonidas' men soldier on, intent on letting it be known they will bow to no man but their king. Meanwhile, back in Sparta, the loyal Queen Gorgo attempts to convince both the skeptical council and the devious Theron (Dominic West) to send more troops despite the fact that many view Leonidas' unsanctioned war march as a serious transgression. As Xerxes' fearsome "immortals" draw near, a few noble Greeks vow to assist the Spartans on the battlefield. When King Leonidas and his 300 Spartan warriors fell to the overwhelming Persian army at the Battle of Thermopylae, the fearless actions of the noble fighters inspired all of Greece to stand up against their Persian enemy and wage the battle that would ultimately give birth to the modern concept of democracy

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City
programme.desc: Three flawed individuals search for a violent justice on the rain-soaked, crime-ridden streets of Basin City

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: The Caped Crusader battles Two-Face and the Riddler in this sequel

programme.title: Village of the Damned
programme.desc: This film is a remake of the classic 1960 science-fiction thriller, Village of the Damned, which was based on the novel The Midwich Cuckoos by John Wyndham. Veteran horror director John Carpenter is at the helm this time, with Christopher Reeve replacing George Sanders in the starring role. Aliens put the entire village of Midwich to sleep for 24 hours and impregnate many women. Reeve plays Alan Chaffee, the town doctor, whose wife Barbara (Karen Kahn) is one of the women carrying an alien baby. Visiting scientist Dr. Susan Verner (Kristie Alley) is monitoring the situation for the government. She supervises a mass birthing in a barn. The children turn out to be white-haired, glassy-eyed, and telepathic. Their plan is to use their supernatural powers to kill the villagers and help the aliens take over, and only Chaffee and Verner can stop them

programme.title: Batman: Under the Red Hood
programme.desc: In this action-packed animated adventure, diabolical vigilante Red Hood (voice of Jensen Ackles) sets out to clean up the streets of Gotham City and destroy Batman. Meanwhile, the Joker reappears to taunt Batman in his darkest hour

Sex comedy about a successful, middle-aged Hollywood songwriter who fails hopelessly in love with the woman of his dreams. He even follows the girl and her new husband to their Mexican honeymoon resort, but, while his behaviour seems sure to land him in trouble, out of the blue fate plays into his hand

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: When a suburban wife meets a Manhattan book dealer and begins an affair, her husband begins to suspect something and hires a detective. Soon learning the truth, the husband takes matters into his own hands and decides to confront his wife's lover

programme.title: What We Do in the Shadows
programme.desc: Three vampires try to blend into modern society while still feeding their fiendish urges

programme.title: Gentlemen Broncos
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager has his idea for a science fiction novel stolen by a pretentious professional author

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an ageing man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: A South African mercenary and a fisherman try to recover a priceless diamond amid the civil war in 1990s Sierra Leone

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: In this incredible true story, a reporter investigates a possible link between the CIA and the importing of cocaine into the U.S. in the 1980s

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City
programme.desc: Four tales from Sin City including a muscular brute who's looking for the person responsible for the death of his beloved Goldie

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: What Lurks Within. Rev. Anderson becomes increasingly alienated; Sidney's revelation stuns Kyle

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: Chaos reigns when a virus starts turning humans into blood-crazed predators. An alternate ending follows the film

programme.title: The Green Inferno
programme.desc: In this gruesome tribute to the Italian cannibal films of yesteryear, a group of young American activists on a mission to save the rain forest are captured by a sadistic tribe of flesh-eating locals

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A con artist takes on an inexperienced apprentice, but struggles to keep his eyes on the prize when he develops romantic feelings for her
