programme.title: What We Do in the Shadows
programme.desc: Three vampires try to blend into modern society while still feeding their fiendish urges

programme.title: Gentlemen Broncos
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager has his idea for a science fiction novel stolen by a pretentious professional author

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an ageing man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: A South African mercenary and a fisherman try to recover a priceless diamond amid the civil war in 1990s Sierra Leone

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: In this incredible true story, a reporter investigates a possible link between the CIA and the importing of cocaine into the U.S. in the 1980s

programme.title: Formula 51
programme.desc: Samuel L Jackson plays a pharmaceutical genius who has used his knowledge to make a fortune in illegal drugs, particularly with Formula 51, named after its potency above heroin, crack, anything. But instead of selling it to his drug lord employer, he jets to Liverpool where Robert Carlyle is acting as broker for Ricky Tomlinson, who's prepared to offer $20m for the formula - money Jackson would love to spend if he can stay alive long enough in Ronny Yu's fast moving crime thriller

programme.title: Cop Car
programme.desc: Two rebellious young boys (James Freedson-Jackson and Hays Wellfordget) get more than they bargained for when they steal a police cruiser to go for a fun joy ride but are instead thrown into a world of terror after finding a body in the trunk. At the same time the car's owner, a small town sheriff (Kevin Bacon), tracks them down in a murderous rage. Directed by John Watts

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: Nicholas Sparks' best-selling novel comes to the big screen in this romantic drama from director George Tillman Jr.. The plot centers on the star-crossed love affair between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle, and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an aging man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration. Scott Eastwood, Britt Robertson, Jack Huston, and Alan Alda star

programme.title: The Poseidon Adventure
programme.desc: Ronald Neame's cult action adventure stars Gene Hackman as Frank Scott, the priest who leads a rag-tag group of survivors on a quest to escape the capsized ocean liner Poseidon . On their way to the safety of the propeller shaft, which has become their only route to survival, they must overcome fire, steam and, of course, lots of water

programme.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
programme.desc: A shiftless bank robber looking to provide for his family crosses paths with an ambitious cop during a heist, changing both of their lives forever

programme.title: Excalibur
programme.desc: The myth of King Arthur. Uthur Pendragon is given the mystical sword Excalibur by the wizard Merlyn. At his death Uthur buries the sword into a stone, and the next man that can pull it out will be King of England. Years later Arthur, Uthur's bastard son draws Excalibur and becomes king. Guided by Merlyn, Arthur marries Guenivere and gathers the Knights of the Round Table. Arthur's evil half-sister Morgana sires a son with him, who may prove his downfall

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: An Oscar-nominated Will Smith stars as Muhammad Ali in Michael Mann's heavyweight biopic of the boxing icon

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Evan Baxter is a rising congressman with a bright future and his goal to change the world. God hears this message and decides to give him a hand. Delivering Evan the material and the animals, he sets Evan the task of building an ark. After trying to ignore God as much as possible, Evan eventually goes ahead with the plan, even if the other Congressmen and his family thinks he's mad

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker

programme.title: Point of No Return
programme.desc: An outwardly faithful remake of Besson's La Femme Nikita, but with a new focus on action and violence, Point of No Return tells the story of a drug-addicted young beauty on a fast track to oblivion who is arrested and forced to choose between going to prison to suffer the death penalty or working as an assassin for the U.S. government. She chooses the latter and must undergo specialized and rigorous training. Afterward, she is sent to Venice, California where she falls in love with a photographer. She only kills a few people before she begins looking for a way out. Unfortunately, death seems to be the only way out

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: When terrorists attack a US housing compound in Saudi Arabia, an FBI agent leads a team to investigate. However, when diplomacy prevents the team from taking any action, they team up with a rogue Saudi agent to find the extremists and deliver justice, regardless of protocol

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Two strangers are ripped from their ordinary lives when they are coerced to become part of a high-tech assassination plot. Through blistering chases and shocking twists they try to escape, but where can they go when the enemy is everywhere?

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Dustin Hoffman stars as a con man who does a good deed, only to have someone else take the credit---and the reward

programme.title: Ffolkes
programme.desc: This action satire sports an odd title derived from the last name of its hero, Rufus Excalibur ffolkes (no capital "f", played by Roger Moore). The story is based on a novel by Jack Davies, Esther, Ruth, and Jennifer, the names of a supply ship, a drilling rig, and a production platform, in that order. Misogyny of sorts is also the name of the game as it seems to be one of the guiding lights of mercenary ffolkes, whose name in the end, is open to all sorts of interpretations. A menacing psycho (Anthony Perkins) has taken over Esther and is threatening to bring down Ruth and Jennifer who are located in the North Sea unless his money demands are met. So ffolkes is called in by the powers that be to set his crew of frogmen into action and rescue Esther, thereby saving Ruth and Jennifer. With witty exchanges and engaging action scenes, ffolkes is enhanced by the star presence of Moore and James Mason, who plays a tradition-bound admiral

programme.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: George Clooney, John Turturro and Tim Blake Nelson are three chain-gang convicts who make a break for freedom when Clooney finds out his wife is going to re-marry - he convinces the other two to join him with a story of buried treasure. The Coen Brothers' deliriously weird Oscar-nominated film, improbably (and very loosely) based on The Odyssey sees the trio travel across the Depression-hit south, meeting along the way Sirens and a one-eyed Bible-salesman (John Goodman) as well as blues singer Tommy Johnson (Chris Thomas King) who helps them become unlikely recording stars before journey's end

programme.title: Bulletproof
programme.desc: Damon Wayans and Adam Sandler star in Bulletproof an action comedy from Universal Pictures. The story of a cop, a crook, and a beautiful friendship gone sour takes place in a world where loyalty goes to the highest bidder and the only one you can trust turns out to be your worst enemy. Once partners in crime, Archie Moses and Rock Keats are now on opposite sides of the law. Each feels betrayed by the other, but as fate would have it they're back together and on the run

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: In this icy and stylish sci-fi thriller, a dying New York real-estate tycoon (Ben Kingsley) undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man (Ryan Reynolds), but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body

programme.title: Kiss the Girls
programme.desc: Disturbing thriller about the hunt for a killer - known only as Casanova - who has kidnapped a number of women and murdered two of them. When a detective's niece goes missing, he is drawn into a complex and highly personal investigation. The local police are unappreciative of his efforts, but his niece manages to escape with valuable information about the killer

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two siblings uncover a harrowing secret about their grandparents while spending a week at their remote Pennsylvania farm

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: An apartment block janitor discovers a magical woman in the swimming pool, who tells him that she has come from a children's fairytale and needs his help to return home. But something dangerous lurks in the woods as the story begins to take over the lives of the characters

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Donning dark suits and shades, Tommy Lee Jones and Will Smith return as alien-hunting überagents in this sequel to the 1997 smash hit. This time, the agents are on the trail of a sexy extraterrestrial (Lara Flynn Boyle) determined to destroy the world. Rip Torn, Tony Shalhoub, Johnny Knoxville, Rosario Dawson

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: A mysterious, superhuman assassin teams with a young woman to take down a major corporation plotting to use his genetic makeup to create a race of unstoppable killers

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: Prepare for supernatural thrills when an immortal witch hunter faces off against the Witch Queen, who has returned from the dead, in a battle where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: Retired hit-man John Wick (Keanu Reeves) hits the streets of NYC in search of the gangsters who robbed him of his reason for living in this Lionsgate thriller featuring Michael Nyqvist, Alfie Allen, Adrianne Palicki, Ian McShane, John Leguizamo, and Willem Dafoe

programme.title: Eastern Promises
programme.desc: Nurse Naomi Watts gets mixed up with the Russian Mafia, but whose side is mob muscle Viggo Mortensen on? Brutal thriller from David Cronenberg. Strong language/violence/sex

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: Fans of Arnold Schwarzenegger will be delighted as Arnie takes on his biggest fight yet... with the Devil himself! Satan, played by Gabriel Byrne, is in town and he has just one thing on his mind - to impregnate a woman with the Devil's spawn before the turn of the Millennium

programme.title: The Specialist
programme.desc: Action thriller about an explosives expert and contract killer hired by a woman who wants revenge on the Cuban drug lord who murdered her father. Living in seclusion following an operation that went wrong and a confrontation with a crooked colleague, the hit man only reluctantly gives in to the wronged woman's persistent pleading. But when he finally agrees, he finds himself pitted against his old enemy, now in the drug lord's employ

programme.title: Gotcha!
programme.desc: TOP GUN star Anthony Edwards stars in this thrilling tale of a campus game of 'assassination' that turns deadly when an American college student gets involved in a dangerous C.I.A. plot in east Germany. The young Fiorentino shines as a Czech spy

programme.title: The Return of the Musketeers
programme.desc: d'Artagnan tries to reunite the remaining musketeers to save Queen Anne from the machinations of the devious Cardinal Mazarin

programme.title: Waitress
programme.desc: Keri Russell plays Jenna Hunterson, a waitress and cook whose pies are loved by everyone in town. She dreams of leaving her abusive husband Earl but when she falls pregnant by him, becomes resigned to her fate and cooks up yet another batch of pies, oblivious to the attentions of Dr Jim Pomatter. But in Adrienne Shelly's bittersweet romantic comedy, love can lie at the end of the unlikeliest of roads. Writer/director Shelly was murdered just before the film made its acclaimed debut at Sundance. Edited for language

programme.title: The Ladies' Man
programme.desc: Saturday Night Live cast member Tim Meadows gets his own movie as Leon Phelps, a radio host and sex therapy expert. (2000)

programme.title: Just Married
programme.desc: Goofy Tom and rich kid Sarah head to Venice on honeymoon. He's worried about her ex, who has followed them; she's concerned that Tom only wants to watch TV. Either way, they're unlikely to make it home together

programme.title: The Heartbreak Kid
programme.desc: After a honeymooning newlywed (Ben Stiller) realizes he's involved in a nightmarish marriage, he meets the woman of his dreams (Michelle Monaghan). Hilarious remake of the 1972 hit film that starred Charles Grodin and Cybill Shepherd. Stiller's father Jerry Stiller costars as Doc. Directed by Bobby and Peter Farrelly, who co-wrote the script with Kevin Barnett, Leslie Dixon and Scot Armstrong

programme.title: Burn After Reading
programme.desc: Joel and Ethan Coen are at the helm of this loopy delight about two hapless gym employees (Brad Pitt, Frances McDormand) who find a computer disc containing "secret CIA stuff" and then try to blackmail the agent (John Malkovich) to whom it belongs. The Coens also wrote the script and produced the film, and served as editors under their oft-used pseudonym Roderick Jaynes. The entire cast gives first-rate performances and also features George Clooney, Tilda Swinton and Richard Jenkins

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: A husband becomes a suspect in his wife's disappearance after she vanishes on their fifth wedding anniversary

programme.title: Batman Returns
programme.desc: The world's most enigmatic superhero, Batman, resurfaces for another Gotham City adventure. This time, he's pitted against villainous freak The Penguin and the devious, sexually-charged Catwoman, both of whom are out for revenge against the world which has treated them so cruelly and which Batman seems to represent

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin finds himself on the run after he is double-crossed on a mission in Russia in this stylised adaptation of the popular video game

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: In this icy and stylish sci-fi thriller, a dying New York real-estate tycoon undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man, but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: A South African mercenary and a fisherman try to recover a priceless diamond amid the civil war in 1990s Sierra Leone

programme.title: What We Do in the Shadows
programme.desc: Three vampires try to blend into modern society while still feeding their fiendish urges

programme.title: Stephen King's 'Graveyard Shift'
programme.desc: A group of workers hired to clean up the rat-infested subterranean depths of a textile mill uncover a man-eating monster rodent, then have to use all of their skills to escape unscathed

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: An astronaut crash-lands on a planet governed by a race of civilised simians

programme.title: An American Haunting
programme.desc: The wind whispers ominous warnings of death before a malevolent entity arrives to claim the life of a young girl as director Courtney Solomon brings author Brent Monahan's chilling, fact-based story of supernatural murder to the screen in this tale of terror starring Donald Sutherland and Sissy Spacek. The year is 1818 and the Bell family is a quiet clan residing on a remote farm in Red River, TN. A normal, loving family by all accounts, the uneventful lives of the Bell family begin to take a dark turn when strange noises around the farm are followed by the arrival of a black wolf with piercing yellow eyes said to strike unspeakable fear into the very soul of all who encounter it. As the sadistic spirit singles out the youngest daughter of the Bell family for torment and her frightened parents search frantically for a rational explanation to the chilling events unfolding in their once-happy home, an eerie, disembodied voice promises death from beyond the grave. With the struggle rapidly turning violent and the Bells' desperate prayers for mercy going unanswered time and again, the shocking murder that followed would prove the only case in recorded American history where the death of a human being was directly attributed to an attack by an evil entity or spirit

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a female TV news channel boss and two male reporters (William Hurt and Albert Brooks) in this 1988 comedy

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: The film revolves around a Jewish man named Guido Orefice in Italy. Witty and comical, he falls in love with Dora, a beautiful young woman. They get married and have a son named Joshua. Their life comes to a tragic halt when they are picked up for a Nazi concentration camp. Guido decides to hide the real situation from his son and makes him believe that they are in the camp to play games and have fun

programme.title: Field of Dreams
programme.desc: Beloved uplifting drama with Kevin Costner on a heavenly mission to build a baseball field

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Divine comedy sequel to 2003's "Bruce Almighty." A hilarious Steve Carell reprises his role as newscaster (now Congressman) Evan Baxter, who's summoned by God to build an ark. Morgan Freeman once again takes on the role of the deity. Directed by Tom Shadyac, who also helmed the original. Lauren Graham costars as Evan's disbelieving wife. Wanda Sykes, John Goodman, Molly Shannon, John Michael Higgins

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Legal thriller about a brilliant engineer trying to get away with murder and the dogged prosecutor on his tail

programme.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
programme.desc: A fading actor, best known for his portrayal of a superhero, plans a comeback by appearing in a Broadway play in this blisteringly funny showbiz satire. However, his attempts to become more altruistic, rebuild his career and reconnect with friends and family prove more difficult than expected

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: Innocent college student Dakota Johnson begins a relationship with troubled businessman Jamie Dornan. Adaptation of EL James's erotic bestseller

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: Nicky has studied the science of human nature his whole life, and understands precisely how to earn anyone's trust, or fool them into never noticing he's stealing their watch, or wallet, or anything they might have that Nicky can sell. In the movie's opening sequence, he's eating at a New York restaurant when the gorgeous Jess approaches his table and asks him to pretend to be her boyfriend so that she can avoid a particularly determined guy at the bar who won't stop hitting on her. The two of them hit it off, but he quickly figures out that she's running a scam on him and soon turns the tables on her and her partner. Undaunted, Jess begs Nicky to teach her what he knows about the criminal life, and he brings her in on a plan to steal from as many people as possible during Super Bowl week in New Orleans. She turns out to be a natural, and quickly learns the ropes of this unscrupulous world. Nicky and Jess seem to be falling for each other, but Nicky's actions at the end of their New Orleans trip force Jess to reassess their relationship. Three years later, Nicky enters into a deal with Garriga (Rodrigo Santoro), a wealthy playboy who has a software program that will help his Formula 1 team triumph. Nicky agrees to help Garriga sell a fake version of the program to his competitors, but as the plan goes into motion he discovers Jess and Garriga are a couple. As old feelings complicate the new arrangement, Nicky must also contend with the no-nonsense Owens (Gerald McRaney), Garriga's head-of-security who openly distrusts Nicky

programme.title: Thunderbolt
programme.desc: Thunderbolt was Josef von Sternberg's first American talking picture. George Bancroft, a von Sternberg regular (despite frequents clashes between the two men), plays a death row inmate who may be on the eve of eternity, but who has still one more murder on his mind. He plans to kill the young lover (Richard Arlen) of his former girl friend (Fay Wray); fortuitously the lover is incarcerated in the same prison where Bancroft awaits the chair

programme.title: Below the Sea
programme.desc: In this film, Ralph Bellamy is incongruously cast as a he-man deep sea diver. The plot is set in motion by former U boat commander Frederick Vogeding, who seeks out a fortune in gold and jewels which sank to the bottom of the sea during WWI

programme.title: The Most Dangerous Game
programme.desc: A mad Russian hunter becomes bored with big game and decides to hunt humans. He captures his victims and sets them loose on his wooded island with only a knife to defend themselves from him

programme.title: One Sunday Afternoon
programme.desc: A married dentist rekindles his romance with his former girlfriend who he lost years before when she fell for and married his best friend

programme.title: Phantom of the Rue Morgue
programme.desc: This big-budget remake of 1932's Murders in the Rue Morgue, which was based on an Edgar Allen Poe tale, this horror outing was originally shown in 3-D and tells the grim tale of how a mad zookeeper and his murderous, thieving monkey terrorized Parisians in the early 1900s. A young Merv Griffin plays a bit part as a college student

programme.title: Hot Millions
programme.desc: A Cockney con-artist just out of prison replaces an insurance company's programmer and sends claim cheques to himself in various guises at addresses all over Europe

programme.title: Hotel
programme.desc: Based on the novel by Arthur Hailey ('Airport') we follow a hotel manager dealing with his guests and a malfunctioning elevator

programme.title: Take the High Ground
programme.desc: Adventure yarn as a 'hard-cop-soft-cop' pair charged with moulding a crew of raw recruits into a fighting machine fit to take on the toughest enemy action

programme.title: Bombers B-52
programme.desc: A U.S Air Force sergeant's dislike of a hotshot colonel becomes even more dramatic when he discovers his beloved daugther is in love him

programme.title: The Cat o' Nine Tails
programme.desc: Dario Argento's thriller stars Karl Malden as Franco Arno, a blind ex-journalist, living with his young orphaned niece. One day he overhears a plot to cause industrial espionage and blackmail, and decides to investigate further, with the help of reporter Carlo Giordani (James Franciscus). A series of tense set-pieces ensue, with the two receiving death threats from ominous sources

programme.title: Gypsy
programme.desc: Mervyn LeRoy's eye and ear-catching screen version of the hit Broadway musical stars Rosalind Russell as a monstrously ambitious stage mother who is determined to make her two daughters vaudeville stars. With Natalie Wood and Karl Malden. Wide

programme.title: On the Waterfront
programme.desc: Kazan's powerful, Oscar-winning study of the influence of racketeers on New York City longshoremen

programme.title: A Streetcar Named Desire
programme.desc: Marlon Brando in compelling form as the working man teased by sister-in-law Vivien Leigh. As Stanley Kowalski, the inarticulate Polish factory worker, Brando won a million hearts and virtually invented the US T-shirt industry

programme.title: All Fall Down
programme.desc: In one of his first roles, Warren Beatty plays a callous, self-involved young man who is idolized by his younger brother Brandon DeWilde. When Beatty and DeWilde's parents Karl Malden and Angela Lansbury take in Eva Marie Saint as a boarder, Beatty makes violent love to the poor (but not entirely unwilling) girl. Saint becomes pregnant, a contingency which brings out the absolute worst in Beatty. When he deserts her, she kills herself. Only at this point does DeWilde (who has worshipped Saint from afar) realize that Beatty has feet of clay. Attempting to kill his older brother, DeWilde relents when he decides that Beatty is more pathetic than evil. Playwright William Inge adapted the screenplay for All Fall Down from a novel by James Leo Herlihy. So dependent is this film on its stark black and white photography that the currently available colorized version is tantamount to sacrilege

programme.title: Baby Doll
programme.desc: The owner of a successful cotton company is married to a teenager who refuses to have sex with him until she's 20. When the man burns down a rival's business, the enemy tries to claim the wife as his compensation

programme.title: Twilight Time
programme.desc: In this drama, a Yugoslavian native leaves the U.S. and returns home after a 20-year absence. Back in his home fishing village, he begins caring for his grandchildren so their parents can go to West Germany and work. The grandfather makes the children work very hard

programme.title: The Defector
programme.desc: A U.S. physicist (Montgomery Clift) vs. a Communist agent (Hardy Kruger) in a tale of Cold War intrigue in Germany. David Opatoshu. Adam: Roddy McDowall. Frieda: Macha Meril. Spy: Jean-Luc Godard. Ingrid: Christine Delaroche. Major: Karl Lieffen. Saltzer: Hannes Messemer. An excellent cast

programme.title: The Big Lift
programme.desc: 50s drama shot on location in Berlin as two Air Force sergeants find love while flying the Berlin Airlift. With Montgomery Clift, Paul Douglas

programme.title: Lonelyhearts
programme.desc: For his film directorial debut, producer Dore Schary selected a longtime pet property: Miss Lonelyhearts, Nathaniel West's trenchant 1933 novel. Montgomery Clift delivers a haunting performance as journalist Adam White, assigned by his cynical editor Adam Shrike (Robert Ryan) to take over a newspaper advice column. Signing himself Miss Lonelyhearts, White is appalled by the human misery pouring out of the letters sent to him (one of his correspndents was born without a nose), but Shrike insists that anyone who'd write to such a column is fake. To find out for himself, White looks up one of the correspondents, unhappily married Fay Doyle (Oscar-nominated Maureen Stapleton). His pity for the seriously disturbed Fay nearly leads to tragedy (in the novel, there's no "nearly"). Meanwhile, Shrike tries to contend with his own tottering marriage to his wife Florence (Myrna Loy). In additional to shortening the title to Lonelyhearts, Dore Schary made a number of radical changes in the original, adding an overabundance of "meaningful" dialogue and softening the character of Florence Shrike. Purists were enraged by Schary's liberties, while critics carped at his perfunctory direction; audiences, however, seemed to like the film

programme.title: Suddenly, Last Summer
programme.desc: A woman donates to an asylum on the condition that her niece be treated there, in this version of Tennessee Williams's play

programme.title: The Misfits
programme.desc: Roslyn, on the run from a loveless marriage, falls in with a group of old cowboys as they wrestle mustangs and bet on rodeos

programme.title: The Search
programme.desc: While his mother searches for him, a nine-year-old boy flees refugee camps, fearing the same treatment he suffered in Auschwitz. The first Hollywood movie filmed in Germany after the war, with a splendid performance by Montgomery Clift in only his second picture

programme.title: Wild River
programme.desc: When a Tennessee Valley Authority worker tries to buy out an elderly widow in his efforts to move forward with one of the TVA's projects, he finds that her land is no more for sale than her freedom. She and the locals cause him endless problems, but somehow love still manages to find a toehold in his determined soul. Strong characterizations make this a powerful movie of individual freedom

programme.title: Red River
programme.desc: John Wayne -- showing off a darker side to his screen persona than we'd previously seen -- portrays Thomas Dunson, a frontiersman who, with his longtime partner Nadine Groot (Walter Brennan), abandons a westbound wagon train in 1851 to make his future as a rancher in Texas. Doing so forces him to abandon Fen (Colleen Gray), his fiancee -- and when she is killed in an Indian raid a short time later, it taints any good that Dunson might find in the future he carves out for himself, destroying any joy he might derive from life. The sole survivor of the raid is Matthew Garth (Mickey Kuhn), a young orphan who is unusually handy with a gun for one his age -- and already knows how to channel his grief and horror at what he's seen, as much as Dunson does. Dunson informally adopts Matt as his son, and over the next 14 years he builds up one of the largest ranches in the entire state of Texas. And all of it is worth nothing, a result of the economic ruin wrought on the state in the aftermath of the Civil War. Matthew (Montgomery Clift), now back from the war and doing some of his own adventuring, finds a darker, more taciturn Dunson than he's ever known -- as Groot tells it, he's afraid because he just doesn't know how to fight the threats he now faces. With Matthew now returned, Dunson decides to move his herd, nearly 10,000 head of cattle, to Missouri, where there is a market for beef, over 1000 miles away through territory controlled by border gangs hundreds of men strong that have stopped every cattle drive up to now, and Indians who have picked off what the gangs missed. Dunson drives his men as hard as he does himself, relentlessly, till even some of his best hands break under the strain -- and he's not above killing anyone who challenges his authority on the drive. He's able to hold them in line as long as Matthew backs him up, and he does until Dunson, exhausted and worn down by lack of sleep, finally goes too far. Matthew steps in, backed by laconic, smirking gunman Cherry Valance (John Ireland) and most of the rest of the men and takes the herd from Dunson. Leaving his father and mentor behind, he heads the herd toward Kansas, where -- so the men are told -- there's a new railroad. Along the way, he meets Tess Millay (Joanne Dru), a card-dealer who falls in love with the young man. But he has to finish the drive and leaves her behind, much as Dunson left Fen. And they all know that Dunson is coming after Matthew to kill him

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: A poor factory worker, employed by a wealthy uncle, meets and falls in love with an heiress, but his happiness and promising future are jeopardized by a previous affair with a coworker he impregnated. A Best Picture nominee that was adapted from Theodore Dreiser's best seller "An American Tragedy."

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: I Got This on Lock. Ghost sees an opportunity to take the clubs to the next level, but the past may catch up to him; Tommy joins Tasha in a scheme, while dealing with an uncontrollable contact

programme.title: Jimmy's Hall
programme.desc: The story of the only Irishman ever deported from Ireland, Jimmy Gralton, who was arrested and ousted during the country's Red Scare of the 1930s

programme.title: 40 Days and 40 Nights
programme.desc: Josh Hartnett stars in this romantic comedy as a young man so frustrated by love that he decides to give up sex for Lent, a vow that leaves him scrambling for an explanation when he meets the girl (Shannyn Sossamon) of his dreams. Paulo Costanzo, Vinessa Shaw, Adam Trese, Griffin Dunne, Michael C. Maronna

programme.title: When the Game Stands Tall
programme.desc: The true story of celebrated American football coach Bob Ladouceur, and the personal trials he endured while leading the De La Salle High School Spartans on an unprecedented 151-game winning streak

programme.title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when a family find themselves having the worst day ever! Family comedy starring Steve Carell and Jennifer Garner

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A con artist gets a shot at redemption when his mentor asks him to protect a superpowered suit. Donning the stunning technology, which shrinks him down to minuscule size, he fights off villains seeking to steal the invention

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Three best friends reunite every Christmas Eve for a wild night of debauchery in New York City. Since they're getting older and have new responsibilities, they plan one last epic bash together and try to find their way into the biggest party in the city, the Nutcracka Ball

programme.title: Men of Honor
programme.desc: Remarkable yarn about Carl Brashear, the first African- American diver in the US Navy

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Thank-You Note. Reggie and Missy debate the importance of manners and social etiquette after meeting a wealthy Atlanta couple

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: Underwater adventure about a group of divers who find themselves in deep trouble with a drug lord after discovering the illicit cargo of a crashed plane

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, a young Apatosaurus is swept away by a vicious river current and ends up far from home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child along the way

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A con artist gets a shot at redemption when his mentor asks him to protect a superpowered suit. Donning the stunning technology, which shrinks him down to minuscule size, he fights off villains seeking to steal the invention

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Call Me James. Season 3 begins with Ghost out of the drug game, and Angela having to decide between love and honor. Also, Tasha is reeling from Shawn's death, and Tommy feels compelled to make some adventurous moves

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: It's Never Over. Ghost deals with loose ends before tangling with some new nightlife competition; Tommy confronts Tasha, who must learn to coexist with Angela. Later, Tommy finds an advisor in a former lover

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: I Got This on Lock. Ghost sees an opportunity to take the clubs to the next level, but the past may catch up to him; Tommy joins Tasha in a scheme, while dealing with an uncontrollable contact

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Thank-You Note. Reggie and Missy debate the importance of manners and social etiquette after meeting a wealthy Atlanta couple

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: Uptight writer Ben is on the way to his wedding when his flight is cancelled. Forced to make the journey with free-spirited stranger Sarah, it begins to seem as if fate may have a different path in mind for him

programme.title: Arlington Road
programme.desc: A college professor begins to suspect that his affable next door neighbour is secretly a terrorist

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: After learning that he is the son of a famous knight, a young peasant blacksmith follows in his father's footsteps and joins the Christian campaign to protect 12th-century Jerusalem from the Muslim forces of Saladin

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A con artist gets a shot at redemption when his mentor asks him to protect a superpowered suit. Donning the stunning technology, which shrinks him down to minuscule size, he fights off villains seeking to steal the invention

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In this enchanting computer-animated fantasy, set in a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, an amiable young Apatosaurus named Arlo (voiced by Raymond Ochoa) loses his father in a storm and is swept away by a vicious river current, stranding him in a frightening new place far from his home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child known as Spot (Jack Bright) along the way.Peter Sohn directed this heartwarming Pixar adventure, with Jeffrey Wright, Frances McDormand, Anna Paquin, and Sam Elliott also contributing voice work

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh-based neuropathologist discovers a degenerative brain disease now known as CTE in the autopsies of several deceased pro-football players. After presenting his research, the doctor finds himself under fire from the NFL

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: I Got This on Lock. Ghost sees an opportunity to take the clubs to the next level, but the past may catch up to him; Tommy joins Tasha in a scheme, while dealing with an uncontrollable contact

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Thank-You Note. Reggie and Missy debate the importance of manners and social etiquette after meeting a wealthy Atlanta couple

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: Cedric the Entertainer racks up the miles and piles on the smiles in this wild road-trip comedy. He plays the patriarch of a dysfunctional California family, traveling to a family reunion in Missouri. En route, they encounter obstacles---and laughs---at every turn

programme.title: Forces of Nature

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: The grieving widow (Rebecca Hall) of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist (Jason Sudeikis) who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing. Directed by Sean Mewshaw

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: It's Never Over. Ghost deals with loose ends before tangling with some new nightlife competition; Tommy confronts Tasha, who must learn to coexist with Angela. Later, Tommy finds an advisor in a former lover

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: I Got This on Lock. Ghost sees an opportunity to take the clubs to the next level, but the past may catch up to him; Tommy joins Tasha in a scheme, while dealing with an uncontrollable contact

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Thank-You Note. Reggie and Missy debate the importance of manners and social etiquette after meeting a wealthy Atlanta couple

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: Uptight writer Ben is on the way to his wedding when his flight is cancelled. Forced to make the journey with free-spirited stranger Sarah, it begins to seem as if fate may have a different path in mind for him

programme.title: Arlington Road
programme.desc: A college professor begins to suspect that his affable next door neighbour is secretly a terrorist

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: After learning that he is the son of a famous knight, a young peasant blacksmith follows in his father's footsteps and joins the Christian campaign to protect 12th-century Jerusalem from the Muslim forces of Saladin

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A con artist gets a shot at redemption when his mentor asks him to protect a superpowered suit. Donning the stunning technology, which shrinks him down to minuscule size, he fights off villains seeking to steal the invention

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In this enchanting computer-animated fantasy, set in a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, an amiable young Apatosaurus named Arlo (voiced by Raymond Ochoa) loses his father in a storm and is swept away by a vicious river current, stranding him in a frightening new place far from his home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child known as Spot (Jack Bright) along the way.Peter Sohn directed this heartwarming Pixar adventure, with Jeffrey Wright, Frances McDormand, Anna Paquin, and Sam Elliott also contributing voice work

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh-based neuropathologist discovers a degenerative brain disease now known as CTE in the autopsies of several deceased pro-football players. After presenting his research, the doctor finds himself under fire from the NFL

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: I Got This on Lock. Ghost sees an opportunity to take the clubs to the next level, but the past may catch up to him; Tommy joins Tasha in a scheme, while dealing with an uncontrollable contact

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Thank-You Note. Reggie and Missy debate the importance of manners and social etiquette after meeting a wealthy Atlanta couple

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: Cedric the Entertainer racks up the miles and piles on the smiles in this wild road-trip comedy. He plays the patriarch of a dysfunctional California family, traveling to a family reunion in Missouri. En route, they encounter obstacles---and laughs---at every turn

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: Uptight writer Ben is on the way to his wedding when his flight is cancelled. Forced to make the journey with free-spirited stranger Sarah, it begins to seem as if fate may have a different path in mind for him

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Thank-You Note. Reggie and Missy debate the importance of manners and social etiquette after meeting a wealthy Atlanta couple

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: I Got This on Lock. Ghost sees an opportunity to take the clubs to the next level, but the past may catch up to him; Tommy joins Tasha in a scheme, while dealing with an uncontrollable contact

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh-based neuropathologist discovers a degenerative brain disease now known as CTE in the autopsies of several deceased pro-football players. After presenting his research, the doctor finds himself under fire from the NFL

programme.title: Extinction
programme.desc: A man and his daughter hide from zombies, which have taken over the world following a viral outbreak. They feel safer when cold weather wipes out most of the creatures, but soon discover that a few of them have adapted to their new environment

programme.title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
programme.desc: The Freeling family is once again spooked by supernatural forces in this sequel to the 1982 blockbuster. JoBeth Williams, Craig T. Nelson, Heather O'Rourke. Robbie: Oliver Robins. Tangina: Zelda Rubinstein. Taylor: Will Sampson. Kane: Julian Beck. Gramma: Geraldine Fitzgerald. Brian Gibson directed

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: During World War II, the backstage hand of a touring Shakespearean theatre company struggles to support the brilliant but tyrannical head of the company

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: When Mr. Miyagi travels to Okinawa, he learns about his father's failing health. Meanwhile he also realises that he still loves Yukie and that creates issues between him and an old friend

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: An aging billionaire and a fashion photographer having an affair with the rich man's wife must struggle against the elements - including a man-eating bear - after their plane goes down in the Alaskan wild

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Hotshot lawyer Andrew Beckett takes his firm to court when he is sacked shortly after the partners discover he has AIDS. Drama

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: Eight strangers with eight different points of view try to unlock the truth behind an assassination attempt on the US president. Dennis Quaid stars

programme.title: Far and Away
programme.desc: Spectacular historical epic from big-time director Ron Howard, in which Tom Cruise plays farmer Joseph Donelly, a man constrained by the Irish tenancy laws which prevent him from owning his own plot of land. He decides to fulfil a dream and heads off for the New World, encountering on the way Shannon Christie (Cruise's real-life wife Nicole Kidman ), a feisty young woman whose father was the governor of an estate similar to the one on which Joseph farmed

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: An aging billionaire and a fashion photographer having an affair with the rich man's wife must struggle against the elements - including a man-eating bear - after their plane goes down in the Alaskan wild

programme.title: Into the Grizzly Maze
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller, two brothers trek into the Alaskan wilderness to pay their respects to their late father, but things go awry when grizzly bears begin mysteriously fleeing their nearby habitat. Joined by a tracker, the siblings realize their safety is in jeopardy and they are being hunted by a large bear

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: Eight strangers with eight different points of view try to unlock the truth behind an assassination attempt on the US president. Dennis Quaid stars

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: The superhero battles a space sludge, which causes his suit to turn black and enhances his powers, but also begins to take over his personality; meanwhile, the man who caused his uncle's death becomes Sandman; and the New Goblin is out to avenge his father's death

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: A severely agoraphobic woman (Beth Riesgraf) must battle three criminals who break into her house in order to burglarize it, since she is unable to bring herself to leave the confines of her home. Adam Schindler directed this horror thriller, with Rory Culkin, Leticia Jimenez, and Martin Starr co-starring

programme.title: Into the Grizzly Maze
programme.desc: In this tense thriller Rowman (James Marsden) arrives at his childhood home in Alaska to pay respects to his late father. He's joined by his brother, Beckett (Thomas Jane) a local law enforcement officer who has just witnessed a bloody scene involving two bootleg cutters who were killed by a grizzly. In an attempt to stop the bear, Douglass (Billy Bob Thornton) an experienced tracker is dispatched into the forest to locate the creature. As the parties converge, they discover that something is mysteriously driving the bears out of the maze. When a grizzly turns his attention to the group, they realize they are the ones being hunted. Directed by David Hackl

programme.title: Just Before I Go
programme.desc: In this raunchy black comedy, a suicidal ne'er-do-well puts together a bucket list for a last visit to his hometown: tell the truth to everyone close to him, confront the high school bully who made his life miserable, and try again for romance with an ex-girlfriend before calling it quits forever. The problem is, maybe life isn't done with him yet

programme.title: The Wedding Ringer
programme.desc: A surrogate best man offers his services to socially awkward grooms

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf (Voice), Jeff Bridges (Voice). Directors: Chris Buck, Ash Brannon. A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick

programme.title: Far and Away
programme.desc: Joseph Donnelly is an impoverished 19th-century Irish tenant farmer who has recently lost both his father and his home to the agents of his unscrupulous landlord. On a mission to avenge his family's injustice at the hands of the ruthless land baron Joseph meets the landlord's daughter and the two run off to America together where the girl expects to claim a piece of land for herself in the Oklahoma Land Rush

programme.title: Into the Grizzly Maze
programme.desc: In this tense thriller Rowman (James Marsden) arrives at his childhood home in Alaska to pay respects to his late father. He's joined by his brother, Beckett (Thomas Jane) a local law enforcement officer who has just witnessed a bloody scene involving two bootleg cutters who were killed by a grizzly. In an attempt to stop the bear, Douglass (Billy Bob Thornton) an experienced tracker is dispatched into the forest to locate the creature. As the parties converge, they discover that something is mysteriously driving the bears out of the maze. When a grizzly turns his attention to the group, they realize they are the ones being hunted. Directed by David Hackl

programme.title: The Wedding Ringer
programme.desc: A surrogate best man offers his services to socially awkward grooms

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge

programme.title: Office Space
programme.desc: A jaded computer programmer decides to get himself fired from his dull job. But his new attitude - coming in late, if at all, disregarding authority and so on - has the reverse effect, actually convincing his bosses that he's management material!

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Peter La Fleur owns Average Joe's Gym, a scruffy establishment with a loyal clientele, while across the street Globo Gym, owned by White Goodman, is all glass and chrome and full of toned muscle. When La Fleur learns that he must pay the bank $50,000 in 30 days, Goodman is overjoyed: he can acquire his rival's building, knock it down and have the car park his gym's always needed. But La Fleur decides to set up a money-earning dodgeball tournament (a sport that consists of not being hit by balls hurled by the opposing team). And, of course, La Fleur's team of misfits end up in a face-off against Goodman's tough pros in the final. Rawson Marshall Thurber's debut feature is a mix of verbal and physical humour, and, if the outcome is never in doubt, both Vaughn and Stiller throw themselves into the venture with enjoyable gusto

programme.title: The Wedding Ringer
programme.desc: A surrogate best man offers his services to socially awkward grooms

programme.title: Cold Comes the Night
programme.desc: A dangerous criminal (Bryan Cranston) takes a desperate hotel owner (Alice Eve) and her young daughter (Ursula Parker) hostage in a last-ditch effort to retrieve his missing cash from a corrupt cop in this edge-of-your-seat thriller from writer/director Tze Chun (Children of Invention)

programme.title: Butterfly
programme.desc: On the verge of the Spanish Civil War, a young boy (Manuel Lozano) learns about life, nature and politics from his kindly old schoolteacher (Fernando Fernán Gómez). Rosa: Uxia Blanco. Ramón: Gonzalo Uriarte. Andres: Alexis de Los Santos. O'Lis: Guillermo Toledo

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: After her father is killed in a car accident, a young girl and her family move to her great-grandmother's farm in Virgina. In time, she learns more about her dad and follows in his footsteps as a writer in this heartwarming and inspirational drama

programme.title: Brokedown Palace
programme.desc: Two carefree Americans embark on an overseas vacation that soon becomes a nightmare in this powerful drama. Alice (Claire Danes) is a headstrong teenager who wants to do something different to celebrate her high school graduation, so she persuades her more reserved best friend Darlene (Kate Beckinsale) to join her on a trip to Bangkok. While enjoying sun and scenery, Alice and Darlene meet Nick Parks (Daniel Lapaine), a charming Australian who shows them the sights and sweet-talks Darlene into a romantic assignation, which is something of a surprise to her bolder friend Alice. Nick then suggests that they join him on a side trip to Hong Kong, but they soon discover that Nick's interest has been neither friendly nor romantic: he has hidden a large amount of heroin in their luggage and is using them as drug runners without their knowledge. When the heroin is found by customs officials, Alice and Darlene are quickly tried and sentenced to 33 years in a hideous prison known to inmates as Broke-Down Palace. Their plight comes to the attention of "Yankee Hank" (Bill Pullman), a renegade American attorney in Asia, but while Hank struggles with the court system to get Alice and Darlene released, they must deal with the living hell of life behind bars, and their own doubts about each other. Brokedown Palace was directed by Jonathan Kaplan, who previously dealt with judicial injustice in The Accused and teens in difficult circumstances in Over the Edge

programme.title: Wolf Totem
programme.desc: A student from 1960's Beijing discovers a common ground between himself and the animals he lives beside in this period drama from director Jean-Jacques Annaud. After being sent to Mongolia to live with a group of herdsmen, Chen Zhen (Feng Shaofeng) develops an affection for a group of wolves who he comes to see as equals, and attempts to adopt and raise an endangered cub

programme.title: Half of a Yellow Sun
programme.desc: Biyi Bandele's drama Half of a Yellow Sun stars Thandie Newton and Anika Noni Rose as twins born into a well-to-do Nigerian family. After completing their education overseas, each makes life choices that lead to a falling out between the once-close women. Eventually, the two sisters become embroiled in their home country's political unrest, which soon leads to civil war

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter helps an FBI agent track down a serial killer. Violent remake of "Manhunter."

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: Martin Scorsese directed this disturbing portrait of a taxi driver driven to madness by urban decay. Robert De Niro gives a brilliant performance

programme.title: Cold Comes the Night
programme.desc: A dangerous criminal (Bryan Cranston) takes a desperate hotel owner (Alice Eve) and her young daughter (Ursula Parker) hostage in a last-ditch effort to retrieve his missing cash from a corrupt cop in this edge-of-your-seat thriller from writer/director Tze Chun (Children of Invention)

Brokedown Palace was directed by Jonathan Kaplan, who previously dealt with judicial injustice in The Accused and teens in difficult circumstances in Over the Edge

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: A U.S. Navy fighter pilot struggles to survive after being shot down and captured during a mission over Laos during the Vietnam War. After enduring a stay in a Vietnamese internment camp, he and his fellow soldiers stage a dangerous escape

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter helps an FBI agent track down a serial killer. Violent remake of "Manhunter."

programme.title: Marie Antoinette
programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst stars as Marie Antoinette in Sofia Coppola's lively biopic which traces her life from teenage bride to doomed queen of France. With Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: Let Go
programme.desc: A depressed parole officer deals with three ex-convicts under his supervision, as well as the boredom of married life

programme.title: The Emperor's Club
programme.desc: A dedicated teacher learns some important lessons about himself years after he retired from the classroom in this drama. William Hundert (Kevin Kline) is an instructor at St. Benedict's School for Boys, an exclusive private academy on the East Coast where Hundert drills his charges on the moral lessons to be learned through the study of Greek and Roman philosophers. Hundert is fond of telling his students, "A man's character is his fate," and he strives to impress upon them the importance of the ordered and examined life. In 1976, however, Hundert finds himself with an especially challenging group of students -- party-minded Fred Masoudi (Jesse Eisenberg) , introverted Martin Blythe (Paul Dano), bright but mischievous Deepak Mehta (Rishi Mehta), and most notably, openly rebellious Sedgewick Bell (Emile Hirsch). The son of a powerful politician, Bell pointedly runs against the current of Hundert's example, questioning the importance of the material, flouting the school's rules, talking out of turn in class, and devoting as much time to his interest in girls as in his studies. However, Hundert sees the possibility of great things in Bell, and encourages him to take part in the school's annual academic competition for the title of Mr. Julius Caesar. Hundert even goes so far as to bend the rules in scoring to favor Bell in the early stages of the contest, but his faith is betrayed when Bell is discovered cheating during the contest finals. Years later, Hundert is reunited with his students, where they learn the years have taught them all a great deal about their virtues and weaknesses. The Emperor's Club also features Harris Yulin, Rob Morrow, and Edward Herrmann

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones

programme.title: Anywhere but Here
programme.desc: A flighty mother and her grounded daughter clash over the direction of their lives after leaving their drab Midwestern town for a more glamorous life in L.A. In time, a family tragedy forces both of them to grow up in this touching comedy-drama

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Romantic comedy. A middle-aged teacher and would-be writer takes his soon-to-be married friend on a week-long road trip through California's wine country. While meditating on friendship, love and regret, they meet two free-spirited local women who make them confront their futures

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: Drama following a US fighter pilot's epic struggle for survival after being shot down on a mission over Laos during the Vietnam War

programme.title: Manhattan
programme.desc: A writer toys with quiting his job; leaving his current wife; and committing to his teenage girlfriend. Meanwhile, he is falling for his best friend's mate; and his lesbian ex-wife has written a tell-all book

programme.title: Marie Antoinette
programme.desc: Kirsten Dunst stars as Marie Antoinette in Sofia Coppola's lively biopic which traces her life from teenage bride to doomed queen of France. With Jason Schwartzman

programme.title: Love Is Strange
programme.desc: A committed gay couple's fledgling marriage is challenged by a series of unexpected setbacks in this powerful drama. When George is fired from his teaching position at a Catholic school, he and Ben lose the NYC apartment they have shared for 20 years. Now in order to get back on their feet, they are both forced into uncomfortable living arrangements that put their union to the ultimate test

programme.title: Sideways
programme.desc: Romantic comedy. A middle-aged teacher and would-be writer takes his soon-to-be married friend on a week-long road trip through California's wine country. While meditating on friendship, love and regret, they meet two free-spirited local women who make them confront their futures

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Operating under the assumption that by procuring alcohol for an upcoming party they will finally be able to break their longstanding losing streak with the fairer sex, socially inept high school seniors Evan (Michael Cera) and Seth (Jonah Hill) set out to secure the adult beverages that could get them off of the geek list before they even attend college orientation. Evan is a bright young student whose outward sweetness belies his suffocating fear of heading off to college without his lifelong best friend Seth -- a hormone-driven mischief-maker who wasn't accepted to the same school as Evan. But Evan and Seth both know that college is a place of personal reinvention, and that if they are able to make that first leap together they will have forged a bond powerful enough to last a lifetime. Meanwhile, Evan and Seth's friend Fogell (Christopher Mintz-Plasse) acquires a hastily rendered fake I.D. that instantly endears him to a pair of truly irresponsible cops (Bill Hader and Seth Rogen). Penned by co-star Rogen in collaboration with former Da Ali G Show co-writer Evan Goldberg, the semi-autobiographical SuperBad was produced by Judd Apatow and directed by Greg Mottola -- who previously helmed episodes of Undeclared and Arrested Development

programme.title: Home Sweet Hell
programme.desc: Successful entrepreneur Don Champagne (Patrick Wilson) discovers that all of the money in the world doesn't give him power over his controlling wife (Katherine Heigl) in this black comedy from Darko Entertainment and director Anthony Burns (Skateland)

programme.title: Milk Money
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a hooker who is 'adopted' by three young boys. Kind-hearted prostitute V (Melanie Griffith) rescues twelve-year-old Frank Wheeler (Michael Patrick Carter) and his friends after they are mugged in the big city. Frank immediately decides that he will set V up with his widower father (Ed Harris) and make sure that he makes her his wife, but the course of true love does not run smoothly!

programme.title: No Such Thing
programme.desc: Sarah Polley stars in this quirky fantasy-drama reminiscent of "Beauty and the Beast." A tabloid-TV staffer (Polley) travels to Iceland to investigate a mythical creature and encounters an immortal, hard-drinking monster (Robert John Burke). She forges a relationship with the beast, who longs for his eternal life to end. Helen Mirren, Julie Christie. Hal Hartley directed and wrote the script

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: Steve Carr's comedy stars Martin Lawrence as Roy McCormick, a basketball coach with anger issues who eventually ends up facing a lengthy ban. His agent suggests a little humility might lessen the blow and gets him a job coaching the Smelters, probably the worst school team in town. At first despairing of a team who can't catch, pass or shoot, McCormick licks them into shape. But on the eve of their big match, he receives an offer to return to top level coaching. Will he take the offer or stay with the Smelters in their hour of need?

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Operating under the assumption that by procuring alcohol for an upcoming party they will finally be able to break their longstanding losing streak with the fairer sex, socially inept high school seniors Evan (Michael Cera) and Seth (Jonah Hill) set out to secure the adult beverages that could get them off of the geek list before they even attend college orientation. Evan is a bright young student whose outward sweetness belies his suffocating fear of heading off to college without his lifelong best friend Seth -- a hormone-driven mischief-maker who wasn't accepted to the same school as Evan. But Evan and Seth both know that college is a place of personal reinvention, and that if they are able to make that first leap together they will have forged a bond powerful enough to last a lifetime. Meanwhile, Evan and Seth's friend Fogell (Christopher Mintz-Plasse) acquires a hastily rendered fake I.D. that instantly endears him to a pair of truly irresponsible cops (Bill Hader and Seth Rogen). Penned by co-star Rogen in collaboration with former Da Ali G Show co-writer Evan Goldberg, the semi-autobiographical SuperBad was produced by Judd Apatow and directed by Greg Mottola -- who previously helmed episodes of Undeclared and Arrested Development

programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a hooker who is 'adopted' by three young boys. Kind-hearted prostitute V (Melanie Griffith) rescues twelve-year-old Frank Wheeler (Michael Patrick Carter) and his friends after they are mugged in the big city. Frank immediately decides that he will set V up with his widower father (Ed Harris) and make sure that he makes her his wife, but the course of true love does not run smoothly!

programme.title: Big Trouble
programme.desc: Corrupt exec Arthur Herk is trying to buy a nuclear bomb. Russian mobsters want the weapon, and two hitmen arrive in Miami to take him out. Add hippies, sarcastic kids and a lorryload of goats for a chaotic comedy

programme.title: Getting Even With Dad
programme.desc: Macaulay Culkin is a clever kid out to reform his small-time crook father in this exuberantly zany and heartwarming comedy for the whole family

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: Gabrielle Union, Morris Chestnut, Queen Latifah, and Terrence Howard star in a film concerning a young girl who implores a department-store Santa to find a new husband for her divorced mother for Christmas. Single mother of three Nancy (Union) has been putting the needs of her three children ahead of her own for as far back as she can remember, and lately her youngest daughter, Emily (Khail Bryant), has become acutely aware of her mother's palpable sadness. As Christmas draws near, Nancy takes her kids to the mall for a cheerful visit with jolly old Saint Nick. When it comes time for Emily's turn to sit on Santa's lap and make her Christmas wish, she selflessly remembers her mother's recent comment that a compliment from a man would be the best gift of all. Determined to make her mother happy again even if it means sacrificing her own wish, Emily relays the message to Santa (Chestnut), not realizing that the man beneath the beard is actually an office-supply salesman and ambitious singer/songwriter named Benjamin. Recognizing the daughter's love for her mother and sensing something truly special in Nancy, Benjamin cheerfully obliges the young girl, setting into motion a series of events that promise to make this the most memorable holiday in quite some time. Lance Rivera directs a film produced by Shakim Compere and Latifah through Flavor Unit Entertainment

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Thank-You Note. Reggie and Missy debate the importance of manners and social etiquette after meeting a wealthy Atlanta couple

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: When a Harvard-educated CIA agent is killed during an operation, the secret agency recruits his twin brother

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Thank-You Note. Reggie and Missy debate the importance of manners and social etiquette after meeting a wealthy Atlanta couple

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: Movie mogul and former gangster Chili Palmer is itching for a new project. He decides to make his first foray into the music business - but his ambition to turn a female performer into a star leaves him with a price on his head

programme.title: Brüno
programme.desc: Gay style icon Brüno leaves Austria to cause chaos and controversy in the USA

programme.title: Ski Patrol
programme.desc: The fun-loving guys of the ski patrol must outsmart an obnoxious group of ski instructors hired by a developer to sabotage and create havoc in a wacky ski resort. From the producer of the "POLICE ACADEMY" series

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: All a young girl wants for Christmas is a husband for her divorced mother, so she dumps the problem into the lap of a department-store Santa, who decides to handle the matter personally

programme.title: Cars
programme.desc: Lightning McQueen may be just a rookie, but he's convinced that he can realize his dream of zooming by the chequered flag if he can only make it to California in time to compete in the upcoming Piston Cup Championship

programme.title: Back to School
programme.desc: In order to encourage his freshman son, an uneducated, self-made millionaire enrolls in college

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: Movie mogul and former gangster Chili Palmer is itching for a new project. He decides to make his first foray into the music business - but his ambition to turn a female performer into a star leaves him with a price on his head

programme.title: Big Trouble
programme.desc: Humorist Dave Barry's comic novel is the basis for this frenetic romp, set in Miami. It's the story of a crazy group of people whose lives interconnect. Included: a Pulitzer Prize-winning columnist (Tim Allen); a nasty industrialist (Stanley Tucci); his put-upon wife (Rene Russo); hit men (Dennis Farina, Jack Kehler); and a philosophical street person (Jason Lee). Ben Foster, Omar Epps

programme.title: Big Top Pee-wee
programme.desc: Comic tale starring Pee-wee Herman. When a freak storm blows the Cabrini Circus on to Pee-wee's farm, his efforts to help out are spoiled by some mean-spirited townsfolk who threaten to ruin the fun. But the plucky Pee-wee and his faithful pig Vance join the performers and animals to find a startling way for the show to go on

programme.title: Cars
programme.desc: Lightning McQueen may be just a rookie, but he's convinced that he can realize his dream of zooming by the chequered flag if he can only make it to California in time to compete in the upcoming Piston Cup Championship

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Emotions run wild in the mind of a young girl who is uprooted from her peaceful life and forced to move cities. Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness each have their own ideas about how she should handle her new surroundings

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: Movie mogul and former gangster Chili Palmer is itching for a new project. He decides to make his first foray into the music business - but his ambition to turn a female performer into a star leaves him with a price on his head

programme.title: Back to School
programme.desc: In order to encourage his freshman son, an uneducated, self-made millionaire enrolls in college

programme.title: Postcards from the Edge
programme.desc: A drugged-out starlet strives for recovery while locked in a dysfunctional relationship with her famous mother, who is a glamorous film icon from the 1950s and 1960s. Inspired by the memoirs of actor Carrie Fisher

programme.title: Big Game
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping an assassination attempt on Air Force One, the president ends up stranded in the wilderness of Finland. A 13-year-old hunter soon finds him, and they work together to evade the terrorists hot on their trail

programme.title: Class Action
programme.desc: Father and daughter lawyers (Gene Hackman, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio) become adversaries in a lawsuit against an auto company. Grazier: Colin Friels. Estelle: Joanna Merlin. Holbrook: Larry Fishburne. Quinn: Donald Moffat. Pavel: Jan Rubes. Brian: Jonathan Silverman. Directed by Michael Apted

programme.title: The Fan

programme.title: Blankman

programme.title: Freetown
programme.desc: A group of Liberian missionaries seek asylum from a brutal civil war. To reach religious and personal freedom, they must travel across their war-torn country while evading rebels out to kill one of their own

programme.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
programme.desc: Sci-fi sequel. In the future, machines rule the Earth, but people are fighting back, so a supercomputer seeks to destroy humankind by sending a virtually indestructible cyborg back in time to kill the human resistance leader in his youth. The boy and his mother, aided by another cyborg, try to alter the events that led to the supercomputer's creation and the subsequent nuclear war

programme.title: The Fan

programme.title: Dysfunktional Family
programme.desc: Comedian Eddie Griffin delivers a set of his outrageous standup comedy and introduces his fans to the family who helped inspire his work in this documentary. In DysFunKtional Family, Griffin talks about race, sex, cats, dogs, slavery, terrorism, Michael Jackson, and several of the more eccentric members of his family during a sold-out live show. In between bits, Griffin takes us on a tour of his home town of Kansas City, where we get to meet his mother, who has a remarkable enthusiasm for corporal punishment; his uncle, who discusses his remarkable enthusiasm for pornography; and another uncle, who proved to be an invaluable help to Griffin's early career despite his drug habit and career as a pimp. DysFunKtional Family was directed by George Gallo, who previously worked with Griffin on the comedy Double Take

programme.desc: Michael Landon Jr. directed this touching feature adaptation of the beloved children's book. programme.title: Thomas and the Magic Railroad
programme.desc: The internationally popular children's television program Thomas the Tank Engine and Friends (shown in the United States as part of the PBS series Shining Time Station) makes its way onto the big screen in this feature-length adventure. On her way to see her Grandpa Burnett (Peter Fonda), young Lily (Mara Wilson) gets on the wrong train and ends up lost. Fortunately, she meets the tiny Mr. Conductor (Alec Baldwin), who shows her a magical railway where the plucky little steam engine Thomas (voice of John Bellis) pulls the line from the enchanted town of Shining Time to the island of Sodor. Thomas' rival is the bigger (and meaner) Diesel Ten, who has already put one of Thomas' allied engines, The Lady, out of commission. Without The Lady, the Conductor has no source for the magic gold dust that allows him to travel from Sodor to Shining Time in the wink of an eye, so Lily and Thomas have to find a way to find more for him. Thomas and the Magic Railroad also features Didi Conn as Stacy Jones (reprising her role from Shining Time Station) and Russell Means as Billy Two Feathers. Like the TV series, Thomas and the Magic Railroad is loosely based on the Thomas the Tank Engine books written by British children's author Wilbert Vere Awdry

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Youngstown Boys. An exploration of the class and power dynamics in college sports through the interconnected journeys of one-time dynamic running back Maurice Clarett and former elite head coach Jim Tressel. Clarett and Tressel emerged from opposite sides of the tracks in Youngstown, Ohio, and then joined up for a magical season at Ohio State University in 2002 that produced the first national football championship for the school in over 30 years. Shortly after, Clarett was suspended from college football and began a downward spiral that ended with a prison term

programme.desc: Fantastic Lies. A 10-year retrospective on the 2006 Duke lacrosse case in which three players were charged with rape, only to have all charges dropped a year later. programme.title: On the Record With Greta Van Susteren
programme.desc: As part of the ongoing ratings war between rival cable services CNN and The Fox News Network, CNN commentator Greta Van Susteren was wooed to the "other network" with promises of a much larger salary and a nightly interview program of her own. That program, On the Record With Greta Van Susteren, debuted on February 4, 2002. While some observers were mildly surprised that Van Susteren, whose politics tended to be left of center, would agree to star on a cable network with a perceived Conservative slant, most of the press attention concerning the new series was focused on Van Susteren's remarkable cosmetic-surgery makeover, which she insisted had been decided upon long before Fox News Network offered her a job. On the Record With Greta Van Susteren was seen on a Monday through Friday basis from 10:00 to 11:00 p.m. EST

programme.desc: Campground Crazies. A trooper finds body parts that appear to be human; two troopers check licenses at a popular fishing spot. Also: The troopers ready for Alaska's Arctic Man event
