programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Cause and Effect. This episode literally begins with a bang, as the Enterprise explodes with all hands on board. A few minutes into the episode, we see that the starship and its personnel are still safe, but not for long. Passing through a time warp in the unexplored Typhon expanse, the crew is doomed to repeatedly experience the series of events leading up to their fiery doom. Will they be able to break chain of cause and effect in time to save themselves? The answers were first provided when "Cause and Effect," written by Brannon Braga, made its American TV debut on March 28, 1992

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The First Duty. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. Wesley is questioned over a cover-up when there's a disaster during training

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Cost of Living. Lwaxana (Majel Barrett) upsets Troi and Worf by taking Alexander under her wing. Meanwhile, the Enterprise experiences mechanical problems when parasites attach themselves to the ship. Campio: Tony Jay. Mr. Homm: Carel Struycken

programme.title: The Real History of Science Fiction
programme.desc: Invasion. The fear of alien invasion in science fiction is explored

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show
programme.desc: With Daniel Craig, Naomie Harris, Christoph Waltz and Sam Smith

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Child. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. After encountering a system ravaged by plague, Troi is impregnated by a mysterious entity

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Where Silence Has Lease. En route to the Morgana Quadrant, the Enterprise is trapped in a void, where the crew discovers a deserted spacecraft. Nagilum: Earl Boen. Picard: Patrick Stewart. Riker: Jonathan Frakes. Troi: Marina Sirtis. Data: Brent Spiner. La Forge: LeVar Burton

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Elementary, Dear Data. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. A holodeck re-enactment of a Sherlock Holmes mystery, designed to test Data, goes awry

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Outrageous Okona. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. The crew find themselves in an interstellar love triangle while Data tries to understand 'humour'

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Loud as a Whisper. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. The Enterprise transports a famous deaf-mute mediator to the site of a bitter planetary dispute

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Perfect Mate. Captain Picard tries to settle a centuries-old war between the Kriosians and the Voltans. As part of the treaty arrangements, the beautiful Kamala (Famke Janssen) is chosen by her people as a peace offering. Picard's diplomatic mission is sorely compromised when he falls in love with Kamala. Further complicating matters, the duplicitous Ferengi insinuate themselves into the negotiations. Written by Rene Echevarria, Gary Perconte, and Michael Piller, "The Perfect Mate" was first telecast May 2, 1992

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Imaginary Friend. The imaginary friend of a girl (Noley Thornton) comes to life when the Enterprise enters a section of space inhabited by a strange form of energy. Isabella: Shay Astar. Alexander: Brian Bonsall. Daniel Sutter: Jeff Allin. Troi: Marina Sirtis. Picard: Patrick Stewart. Riker: Jonathan Frakes

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: I, Borg. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. Picard and the crew suffer conflicting emotions when the Enterprise rescues a critically injured Borg

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Liaisons. A woman falls desperately in love with Picard when they are stranded on a barren planet. Meanwhile, the crew play host to ambassadors from an alien nation

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Interface. Geordi, attached to an experimental probe, thinks he sees his mother on a stranded ship---although the craft was reported missing more than 300 light years away. Capt. La Forge: Madge Sinclair. Dr. La Forge: Ben Vereen. Adm. Holt: Warren Munson. Data: Brent Spiner

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Gambit, Part I. While investigating the apparent death of Picard, Riker is kidnapped and taken to a ship that's been looting archaeological sites---only to discover Picard among the crew. Part 1 of two. Baran: Richard Lynch. Tallera: Robin Curtis. Vekor: Caitlin Brown. Narik: Cameron Thor

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Gambit, Part II. Part two of two. The search for fragments of an ancient Vulcan super-weapon reaches its end, as Riker wins the mercenaries' confidence by helping them attack the Enterprise, but his reward is a challenge to kill Picard

programme.title: The Matrix
programme.desc: After he begins to question the reality of his world, computer hacker Neo finds himself drawn into a group who reveal the terrifying truth behind his everyday life. He soon descends into a nightmare of alternate realities from which he must battle to save himself - and the whole human race

programme.title: The Matrix Reloaded
programme.desc: Sci-fi sequel. The small band of rebels continues to hold out against the machines which have trapped the human race in a computer-generated existence. As people wake up from the Matrix and attempt to live in the real world, the battle moves to Zion - the last real-world city and the centre of human resistance. But when the machines start attacking Zion, the rebels are forced to take the fight back to the Matrix

programme.title: The Matrix Revolutions
programme.desc: As the machines power towards Zion to put an end to human resistance, Morpheus and his crew race back to make one last stand, and Neo takes on Agent Smith for the last time(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Interface. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. Geordi disobeys orders and risks his life to try to rescue his missing mother(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Gambit, Part I. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. Picard is apparently killed on an away mission but then Riker sees him on a mercenary ship. How?(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Gambit, Part II. Conclusion. Picard and Riker, having ingratiated themselves with the mercenaries, seek to drive them to mutiny---and learn the true nature of the artifacts they seek. Baran: Richard Lynch. Tallera: Robin Curtis. Vekor: Caitlin Brown. Narik: Cameron Thor. Riker: Jonathan Frakes(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The boys test out some old bangers in Germany, while former Labour PR chief Alastair Campbell takes a Reasonably Priced Car for a 'spin'(n)

programme.title: Top Gear: Winter Olympics Special
programme.desc: The guys travel to Norway to reenact Winter Olympics events using cars. They play car ice hockey, race a Jaguar against a speed skater, and equip a Mini with rockets and send it off a ski jump(n)

programme.title: Dragons' Den
programme.desc: Episode 1. The original Shark Tank. A toe-tapping pitch is made(n)

programme.title: Dragons' Den
programme.desc: Episode 2. The Dragons encounter a colourful Indian dance troupe, the weird and wonderful world of taxidermy and a young Yorkshire duo try to impress Peter Jones by eating their own product - dog food. Will they do enough to secure a deal?(n)

programme.title: Dragons' Den
programme.desc: Episode 3. A couple of university friends pitch their home brew cider kits hoping to leave the Den victorious, and a loose leaf tea company serve up a refreshing treat. The lift encounters a technical malfunction, and a former Economics student hopes to butter up the Dragons with his new nutty preserve. Will anyone walk away with a deal?(n)

programme.title: Dragons' Den
programme.desc: Episode 4. The original Shark Tank. Nano-suction technology and marshmallow treats are featured(n)

programme.title: Dragons' Den
programme.desc: Episode 5. The original Shark Tank. A young entrepreneur pitches a garden shed invention; a gaming entrepreneur makes a big entrance; and a greetings product is pitched, but valuation and contracts prove to be a sticking point(n)

programme.title: Dragons' Den

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Suddenly Human. The new U.S.S. Enterprise and its crew boldly go where no man has gone before. Picard must decide the fate of a human boy who has been abused by his alien father(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Remember Me. When Wesley's experiment with a warp field goes awry, Dr Crusher is unknowingly catapulted into a universe created by her own mind(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Legacy. A rescue mission leads Picard and the crew to the home planet of their deceased comrade Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister - a fighter for a ruthless nationalist faction that hopes to use the Enterprise's crew to further its own ends(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Reunion. When Picard is chosen to mediate in a Klingon power struggle over who will seize control of the Empire, and Worf confronts Duras, who falsely accused the Starfleet officer's father of treachery and brought shame on his family in the eyes of his species(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Future Imperfect. After an Away Team Mission goes awry, Riker awakens in sick-bay to find that 16 years have passed and that he is about to negotiate a treaty with the Romulans(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Final Mission. In honor of Wesley's acceptance into the Starfleet Academy, Picard asks him to come on a mission to Pentarus Five. But they're forced to make an emergency landing on a lifeless moon, where Picard is critically injured in a rock slide. Dirgo: Nick Tate. Songl: Kim Hamilton(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Loss. Counsellor Troi despairs at her inability to communicate with an alien force which proceeds to override the ship's controls, threatening to destroy the Enterprise and its crew(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Data's Day. A friend's impending wedding compounds Data's confusion about the nuances of human feelings(n)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
